187b5(mdo sde): pa/ zhung zhu yi bdag la lung stor tshig/ chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen la// brjid du med pa tshig tu brjod pam dzad// seng ges wa rnams ji ltar 'phel bgyis pa// mu stegs
187b6(mdo sde): can la'ang sangs rgyas de bzhin te// sems cad kun gyi spyod par rab mkhyer cing // chos rnams kun la'ang ye shes rje su 'jug// ye shes chags med spyod yul yongasu dag/ chos kyi mnga' bdag bdas
187b7(mdo sde): la de lung sngon// 'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin to// nga ltar 'dzin ci mchis pa yang mabyed// dus gsum la ni ye shes thogs med 'jug de phyir bdag 'u shAkya seng ge la// dus gsum ldan
187b8(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal ba'i chos nyid ni// chos kyi rgyal ba com ying rab tu mkhyen// rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// de phyir bdag zhu ye shes rgya mtsho la// khyod la 'khrul pa'i chos ni ci yang med// de bas khyod kyi sems
188a1(mdo sde): nga ma lus spangs// mdung spangs thab gti mug rab tu bcad // pi dbang bdag la byang chub spyod pa ston// chos kyi mtshan nyid che 'drar rgyal bas ma khyer// ros kyi mtsham cid
188a2(mdo sde): de 'dra bdag la ston// bdag gis mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas// mtshan nyid de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa spyad// sems car smod pa mi mthur mtha' yas pa// ji ltar spyod pa spyad pa
188a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa lags// gang thos sems cad spyod pa 'tshal 'gyur ba// spyod la 'jug pa bdag la bshad du gso'o// mar na nyid mi mthun chos kyi rang bzhir mtshan// ngo bo ched spong rang po 'a
188a4(mdo sde): rnam dag pa/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar mngon sum 'gyur// / chos kyi tshul rnams bdag la bstan du gsol// 'di la chos rnams kur gyi pha rol phyir// bstan pa'i rig kun la
188a5(mdo sde): yang shin tu mkhas// the tsom mi mnga' nem nung the tshom chos / bdag la sangs rgyas byang chub bstan tu gsel// de nas ba com ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhor nur gyur pa'i sems
188a6(mdo sde): kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen nas// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' sprul pa// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po chos gcig dang ldan na// yon tan 'di dag
188a7(mdo sde): rab tu 'thob ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ gzhon du 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
188a8(mdo sde): chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin no// gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes she na/ gzhor du 'di la byang chub sems
188b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ming med cing ming dang bral bar rab tu sheso// chos thams cad sgra med pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral ba/ yi ge dang bral ba/ skye ba dang bral ba 'thor
188b2(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba/ rgyu dang mtshan nyid mi 'thun pa// rkyen dang mtshan nyid mi 'thun pa/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mar na nyid gcig pa/ bar na nyid dang bral ba khas
188b3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab/ bsam pa dang bral ba/ yid dang bral bar rab tu shes so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// chos rnams bstan pa gcig po ni/ chos rnams
188b4(mdo sde): thams cad mtsham nyid med// yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pa sa// shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin// de lta bur ni chos bsngar rnams// byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa/ 
188b5(mdo sde): mdo sde bye ba rab ston kyang // de la byang chub rgyur 'chad med// 'dren pas byin gyis rlabs pas na// yang dag nyid kyi mtha' yang she sa// yang dag mtha' de rab shes na// de la che'ang
188b6(mdo sde): bshad pa med// gcig gis kyang ni thams cad shes// gcig gis kyang ri thams cad mthong // ji snyed mang por bshad na yang // de la dregs pa skye ba med// chos rnams thams cad bdag
188b7(mdo sde): med par// de ltar sems kyis nges brtags shing // ming du bstan pa bslabs pa na// yang dag nyid du tshig kyang smra// sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa// de yi sder gyi mthar shes te// sna
188b8(mdo sde): yi sngor gyi mtha' shes nas// sgra dag gis ni de mi 'phrogs// sgra yi sngon mtha' ji 'dra bar// chos rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin te// chos rnams de ldang rab shes na/ mngal du skye par mi 'gyur
189a1(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad mi skye zhing // 'byung ba med par rab tu shes// bstar pa 'di ni rab shes na// rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// ram zhig skye ba
189a2(mdo sde): ma zhugs pa yi// 'khor rnams shin tu mi byed 'gyur// de ltar chos rnams stong par ni// byang chub sems dpa' sras shes pa// nges re gang yang mi shes med// 'di ma tsho'ang med pa'i mtha'/ tsha ya
189a3(mdo sde): mtsha' mthar ma yang // rgyas pa dag gis ci dag 'jags/ bskal dbye ba de ga des// yang dang yang du'a'ar bar byung // rdzil ma 'dre pas mkhyen pa pa sa sam ze dag cheg sam
189a4(mdo sde): las sdug bsngal mi ste ste// ngas 'gro rnams 'ang mi 'gro/ so so'i sgo bo thams cad kyis// de ltar tshul 'di ma shes pas// gang du chos rnams 'gag pa y-i// 'di 'dra'i chos rnams spang
189a5(mdo sde): byed// chos kun rnyed pa med par ni// chos kyi 'du shes gang byung ngo // de lta bu yi 'du shes de// 'du shes de lta ra rig par gyis// rnam par shes dang 'du shes// byis pa dag
189a6(mdo sde): gis 'di brtags pa// brtags pa yi ni chos rnams la// mkhas pa 'ad ni rmongs mi 'gyur/ steng ba rnyog pa med pa'i ches// 'di 'i mkhas pa'i sa yin te// 'di la byis pa'i spyod yul me
189a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod yul lo// 'ib stong pa rab bstan pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa// 'di'i sangs rgyas sras spyod pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyan yi no// 'di ltar byang chub sems
189a8(mdo sde): dpa' dag bag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa// de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te// sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas// chos rnams thams cad gnas med de// de dag la ni gnas yeng
189b1(mdo sde): min// gang gis de ltar gnas shes pa// de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'// sprin dang tshul khrims thos dang bzod// bshes gnyen bzang po bsten byas nas// bya ba 'di dag rnam rig na// byang chub myur du de
189b2(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya// de la lha klu rtag tu bkur sti byed// gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phyo dri za dang // namakha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad dang // mi 'am tshe dang srin po mchod pa byed// sangs rgyas bye ba de ye snyad pa
189b3(mdo sde): rjed/ bskal pa bye ba mang por mi chad par// chos bshad pa'i bsngags pa brjod na yang // de yi mu mtha' zad par nus mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong shes pa// de ni srog chags bye
189b4(mdo sde): ba'i don mang byed// shin tu nges pa 'khor la chos ston te// thos nas dga' zhing ri mo bya ba snyed// de dag gis ni ye shes langs pa 'byung // de phyir rgyal ba mi mchog mthong bar 'gyur// zhing rnam
189b5(mdo sde): na yang bkod pa bzang po mthong // 'jig rjer mgor po de la chos rnams ston// chos kur sgyu ma lta bur shes par gyis// ci ltar bar snang rang bzhir stong pa ltar// de dag gi yang rang bzhin
189b6(mdo sde): de 'drar shes// de ltar sbed pa ci la'ang rags mi 'gyur// ye shes chags pa med cing don byed cheng // 'jig rten na yang byang chub spyod mchog sprod// shes pas chos kun la'ang rab brtags
189b7(mdo sde): de dag 'ang rnams gzhan du sprul pa 'gyed// sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas ngor byas nas// ci ltar chos nyid bzhin du rang bzhin 'gyur// byang chub sems la mi gang gnas pa rnams/ 
189b8(mdo sde): bsam pa ci bzhi mngon rnams rnyed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rigs mi gnas par gang brtson pa// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gzo// rnam par 'bar ba'i lus dang rab ldar zhing // mtsham
190a1(mdo sde): bzang subacu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung // phan yon gzham yang mang po mthar yas pa// ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas thob par 'gyur// rtag tu mi sbrul spobs
190a2(mdo sde): kyang che bar 'gyur// de yi gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de// mkhas pa su dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa// byang bzhir bzang zhing shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// bseng rams gzi brjid
190a3(mdo sde): dpal gyis mngon 'phags te// lhas kyang de'i gzi brjid bzod mi 'gyur// su dag byang chub sems la brtan gnas pa// de ni rtag tu srog chags kun gyi bshes// sangs rgyas
190a4(mdo sde): byang chub 'di ni rab sten pa// de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur// sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du med// nam mkha' che bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin te// 'di lta bu yi tshul mchog
190a5(mdo sde): rnams rigs na// de'i spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur// mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang // sngon gyi maH'am pra zhib rab tu shes// chos kyi rang bzhin shin
190a6(mdo sde): pra shes pas// mkhas pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa med// rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing // sgra dang de tshig rnam pa mang la mkhas// las dang 'bras bu rnam smin nges pa ste/ 
190a7(mdo sde): khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur// mkhas pa bdag nyid cher po stobs bcu'i sras// ma tshang med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang zhing // shir tu phra ba'i rang ba'i mchos shes pas
190a8(mdo sde): de yi dran pa rtag par yongs su ngas/ shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// yid du mi 'ong sbyini thos mi 'gyur// rtag tu snyan cing yidang 'ong sgra yang thos// de'i tshig ni rtag tu ming reng 'gyun
190b1(mdo sde): shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// drar dang blo gros shes rab rtogs dang ldan// de bzhin sems kyang rnyog med dang bar 'gyur// mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chang// yon tan 'di 'dri'i rang ba'in
190b2(mdo sde): ros shes pas// yi ge dang ni tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas// tha dad pa yi sgra mang du ma shes// don dang tshig 'bru la yang mkhas par 'gyur// shi tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// lnga dang mi dang
190b3(mdo sde): klu 'brug srin po dang // lha min lte 'phye mi 'am ci la'ang // rtag tu sdug tsang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin ches shes pas// 'byung po yi dgas srin po'i tshogs rnams ni// 
190b4(mdo sde): shal zab shin tu mi bzang ba// de dag nam yang de la 'jig sa mi skyed// mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas// shin tu dga' zhing ba spu zing zhes byed// sangs rgyas la yang
190b5(mdo sde): dga' ba rgya cher skyed // de dag bsam gyis mi khyab don ren 'a theb// bde bar gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i// bskal pa stong rang de yi bsod rims stobs// rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs
190b6(mdo sde): par mi nus te// dpag tu med cing mtha' yas tshad med do// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis// 'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag med thams cad dang // sangs rgyas ma byor ba dang phyogs bcun/ 
190b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mched// skyes bu la la bsod nams 'dod pas 'dir// stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje can dag la// dga' ba dpag tu med pa steng nas ri// bskal paratha
190b8(mdo sde): yas dpag med rim gre byas// skyes bu gnyis pa bsod nams 'dod pa yis// don dam tshul 'di las ni tshigs bcad gcig/ phyi ma'i dus su gyur tshe 'dzin pa ni// de lo snga ma'i bsod nams ra
191a1(mdo sde): mi phong// 'di ni sangs rgyas mchod pa rab mchog ste// phyi ra mi bzang dus su gyur pa'i tshe// 'di las rig pa'i'i tshigs bcang gcig thos nas// 'dzin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams
191a2(mdo sde): cad ma ched// de dag rtag tu rnyed ra rog legs par rnyeng // de dag gleng gi zas mchog legs pa zas// stobs bcu'i sras kyi thu be dam pa ste// de yis rgyal ba mang po yun ring ba red// bya rgod dung
191a3(mdo sde): po'i ri 'de nga yang mthong // de dag sangs chus mkhyen la ngas lung bstan// mya ngan pa 'das nas ni bams pa yang // de tshe de la lung yang spen par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang
191a4(mdo sde): nga yi bde ba cad du kun 'dod zhes// ngan yer rnam pa dur de la 'arang // mngon dga' der seng sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs mthong // bskal pa pad+ma steng dpag tu med pa yang // leg par ldang
191a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung // byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di spyod pa ni// rtag tu yid rab bde bar myong bar 'gyur// de phyir bye brag 'di 'phags pa 'dra ste// 'di rab tu bshad
191a6(mdo sde): pa par yin mchog/ seMs 'i tshig sa de yi rjes slebs la// phyi mi'i dus la mdo sde 'di zung shig/ mdo sde 'dzin po'i le'u ste/ bdu gcig pa'o// 
191a7(mdo sde): gnon nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa de'i yon ta dang par yor de lta bur 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon 'an dang bsngags pa yang
191a8(mdo sde): dag par smra'o//  bachen gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / med pas mi srur lo// de ci'i phyi chen/ chos gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dbye cas 'angang yang dag pam
191b1(mdo sde): ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing // sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mtha' yas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam pa dang
191b2(mdo sde): bral bas na/ de dag bsam pa 'am dpag par mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon du sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa ste/ gzhon du de ltar sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs
191b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa// ches thams
191b4(mdo sde): da kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yod tar thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dor tshig tu bstar pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
191b5(mdo sde): pa de raM/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtags pa zhes bya ste/ 'byung ba la ma khas shing khams gsum las byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba
191b6(mdo sde): bzhin rab tu shes so// ji lta ba bzhir du lta zhing log par mi smra/ rnam pa gzhan du mi smra/ ji skad smras pa de bzhir byed// khams gsum la yang ma chags shing kharas gsum las yang dag par
191b7(mdo sde): 'das te/ 'dod pa'i sa dang / gzug sa kyi sa dang / gzugs med pa'i sa dang / nyor mongs pa'i sa dang / ming gis dang / sgra'i sa las 'das shing yi ge dang ros kyi tshul la mkhas pa
191b8(mdo sde): ye shes mi zad par bsgoms pas/ brjod du med pa'i chos rdzogs pa/ yi ge shes pa/ yi ge la mkhas pa yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye
192a1(mdo sde): brgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa yin te/ gtan la bang pa'i zla
192a2(mdo sde): ldan zhing / bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis zil gyis mi nor // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ lnga dang mi'i sde dgu sngon yongs bya ba byas pa/ khrag drig phrag
192a3(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyis bye ba bad+ma stong 'khyil ba'i gzungs dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzed pa so sor thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad la/ bsal pa
192a4(mdo sde): grangs meng pa bad+ma stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brgya ngam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad / tshe'i rang ni gci
192a5(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes lung bstan to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems
192a6(mdo sde): dpa' blo dang ldan pa gang // bla na med pa'i byang chub rang tshol zhing // chos dang de bzhinangon la mkhas pa de// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la spyod pa yin/ yang dag ma yin pa'i tshig mi smra// sangs rgyas yon
192a7(mdo sde): ngan bye brag ci 'dra ba// rgyal ba rnams kyi chos ni de yin te// dpa' bo the tshom bral bas shin tu rig/ chos kun don gcig pa po ni rab shes te// mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas// 
192a8(mdo sde): ngag la ni tha dad gyur pa med// don gcig la ni shin tu bslabs pa yin// rtag pa med cing rnam rtog med pa dang // dmigs pa med pas blo gros ldan par shes// zad pa dang ni mi zad 'du shes kyang
192b1(mdo sde): ma lus par ni thams cad rab tu spangs// de ni chos sku mi'i seng ge la// stobs bcu ldan pa gzugasu mi lta zhing // de ni phyin ci logs kun rab spangs pas// mtshan rnam su 'ang lta bar yong mi 'gyur
192b2(mdo sde): chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab// bsam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi/ de lta bur ni rab shes nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong // ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes rig/ de bzhin kun tu blo
192b3(mdo sde): yangs g.yob// chos kun de'i rang bzhin te// rnam par dag pa nam mkha' bzhir// yid la rnams kyang 'byung ba med// chos rnams thams cad shes pas na// khams gsum las ni rnam par gros
192b4(mdo sde): de la smod lam 'debs pa med// yang dag dri ba shing du ni mthong gyur cing // ma log tshig smra rnam pa gzhan mi smra// / de'i tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang // rgyal ba dag gi mthu yi
192b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i sa dang 'on mongs sa rnams dang // gzugs dang gzugs med las kyang shin tu 'da'// chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing // rab tu dga'
192b6(mdo sde): bas 'gro la phan par spyod// mig gi sa las 'das shing sgra yang shes// ngo bo nyid kyis gsog tu gyur pa ste// ji srid tsam du yun ring brjod na yang // de la gnas par byed pa yong ma yin// 'dra
192b7(mdo sde): shes rab tu rgyu ba med// lta ba log pa kun nas zangad // blo yang shin tu gtan la bab// brtan pa rnas pa' 'dra bar spyod/ gal te bdud bye brag khrig rnams// de mi sems dkrugs phyir 'ongs
192b8(mdo sde): kyang // bdud rnams thams cad zil mnan te// de yi dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur// bdud kyi rgya mo rnams spangs te// rdul khribs yongs dge gdung ba med// bas pa gzhar dag ni bdel mos// 'jig
193a1(mdo sde): rjen stong par rab tu shes// 'jig rten phung por smras pa yang // de dag stong par rab tu rig/ skye ba med cing 'gag med pas// chos rnams thams cad mamakha'i bzhin// de dag bang
193a2(mdo sde): nyid gtong byed kyi// stobs bcu'i tshul khrims pha rol phyir// gar smon par yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par 'gro// sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong // mtho ris dag ni mi 'dod
193a3(mdo sde): desmon lam rnams ni yong mi gtong // chos nyid ngag ni spyod tshe// skang tshig brtson 'grus 'ams mi byed 'phyogs bcu yi ni sangs rgyas kyis// de ri shin tu bstod pa yin// de phyir ba nor ru
193a4(mdo sde): 'dzin las// chos 'di dag ni rab thos ras// shes kyi le'i rnam spangs la// skye bo mang la chos rab stor// sangs rgyas yod tar mang ldan pa// rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pa// dge ba 'di la rab
193a5(mdo sde): bsrabs nas// stobs bcu 'arang ba sangs d+hA sa 'gyur// ting 'dzin rje su slob pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'ong ba
193a6(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gzhor du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ ting
193a7(mdo sde): 'dzin nges par bstar lnga labs par bya'o// gzhoran nu de la tingange 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin nyid dang / mnyam pa nyid mi mnyam ba med pa dang / mi rtog
193a8(mdo sde): brnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par ma bsgrubs pa/ kun nas slong ba med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gog pa med pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rdog pa yongasu chud pa/ sems kyi dmigs
193b1(mdo sde): pa med pan yid la byed pa med pa/ rnam par rig pa yong su da pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yongasu chad pa/ mtha' med pa/ mthar yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa yengasu
193b2(mdo sde): chad pa/ phung po dang khams dang // skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa// dran pa dang nga/ blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / cho ga dang // spyod yul dang
193b3(mdo sde): nan tan gyi gnasu gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa/ zhi ba'i sa/ spros pa thams cad yongasu chad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
193b4(mdo sde): spyod yul/ yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzos/ sa pa 'di ni/ gzhar nu ti nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ren po dang nge 'dzir nges pa
193b5(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di la gnas pa ni/ ting 'dzir dang ma bral ba yin// 'khrul pa med pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang lngar dang / sems can dpag tu med pa'i ngor byed pa yir ro// 
193b6(mdo sde): nas de'i re bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa'i sa// shin tu mthong dka' pa zhing zhi// 'du shes thams cad bcom pa ste// de phyir
193b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ces bya// rtog pa med cing rnam rtag med// gzung ba med cing bstan du med// sems kyang dmigs pa med pa ste// de phyir tingange 'dzin ces bya// nam zhig mnyam par bzhag gyur te// 
193b8(mdo sde): chos kun la ni rlob sems med// rlong sems med pa ji ba'i ra ba// de ni tinge 'dzin ces bsgrags// ches ni rdul tsam yod med de// rdul ces bya ba'ang yang ma yin// ros rnams darigasu med
194a1(mdo sde): / med pa ste// de phyir ting 'dzin ches bya// sems kyi dmigs pa med pa yang / de ni rnam par rtog ces bya// ros de rnam par ma brtogs pa// de ltar zhing 'dzir shes par gyis/ 
194a2(mdo sde): sna yis don rnams rab bsten te// sgra de nyid kyang dngos po meng // sgra brag ma lta bu ste// bar snang dag gi na mkha' 'ad// chos 'di rnams ni pi gnas te// 'di dag la ri gnas mi dmigs
194a3(mdo sde): mi gnas pa ni gnas kyi sbyar// ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed do// 'gro zhing 'chi 'phor brjod pa yi// de lta bu'i 'gro ba med// 'gro ba med pa 'gro ba'i sgras// ting 'dzin du de phyir gsungs// @
194a4(mdo sde): bzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod// mnyam ba 'gas 'di yang rlom sems gnyis pa ste/ rlom sems med par byang chub rig par spyod// dram pa rlom sems med pa byang chub mchog/ ma'am
194a5(mdo sde): dang mi mnyam zhi ba sangs rgyas sa// zhi gnas lha ga mthong mtshar reng 'di yin te// zhi ba sangs rgyas sa 'di ba sder byas nas// ting 'dzi na'i ba 'di la de brtser yin// der
194a6(mdo sde): gyi rnam pa rig pa 'jug pa la// yi ge dag gis 'jug par mi nus te/ sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par spangs nas ni// mnyam par ba'ag 'gyur de la rlom sems med// byang
194a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di// ji ltar bshang bzhin gnas shing brtsor byed na// gal te ring 'di bskal pas tshig gyur kyang // raM mchog dbus su zhugs pas mes mi tshig
194a8(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya phrag dang por rab bsregs kyang // mamakha' snga ma chang ram yang mi tshig bzhin// chos rnams mamakha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas// de ni me yi nang du ying mi 'tshig/ gal
194b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la// 'bar ba 'di dag ma lus zhi shig ces// ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab ra// sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med// de ni rdzu 'phrul stong
194b2(mdo sde): kyang mtha' yas 'gyur// dmakha' la yang thegs pa med par 'gro/ rjesu bstar bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di dag myong // sde zhing 'chi 'phor 'gyur yang
194b3(mdo sde): skye ba red cing 'chi 'phe med// gang gis de ltar rnam rig pa// de la ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'// 'chi 'bo skye ba med par ni// 'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad // de ltar 'jig rjen mgon
194b4(mdo sde): rig nas// de phyir ting 'dzin kyang rig/ 'jig tu na gyis ni ma gos shing // 'jig rjer chos la mi chags te/ lus ni thogs pa med par yang // sangs rgyas ring du 'gro bar
194b5(mdo sde): byed// zhing dag na mi 'jig rjen 'dren// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas dag gis zhing bshad pa// chos rnams de ngag der yang ma// de la mi shes yod med
194b6(mdo sde): de chos kyi dbyings dang rab tu 'chang // chos kyi rnam pa rtag tu rig/ de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul// bskal pa bye bar 'chang stor kyang // de yi spobs pa zad mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'
194b7(mdo sde): ga'adamang po// mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par byed// byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o// pad+ma bang ba ma stong pa la/ dkyil mo dkrungs bcas 'dug pa dag/ zhing ris ring du 'gro bar byed/ 
194b8(mdo sde): nga 'dzin yi ba bsgrims nas ni// gzugs dang mdo sde bzang po dang /  sde ma 'a yang bye ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston// sems char mang po bas pa mi khyab// phyir mi
195a1(mdo sde): ldog pa 'ged par byed// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sngon kyang // spobs pa dag ni zad mi 'gyur// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa yi// khang pa brtsegs zhugs de 'gro ste// dri dang ldan
195a2(mdo sde): pa'i me tog gis// 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor// dri dang ldan pa'i phye mas kyang // 'dren pa la ni rab tu 'thor// de dag thams cad byang chub phyir// rgyu che ba yi mchod pa byed// byang chub
195a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' slob pa yi// yon tan dpag med de dag ni// nama'i gnyon mongs med gyur pa// de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag 'thob// nyon mongs dag ni mi skye zhing // dag pa dang ba 'ad gsal ba// 
195a4(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs 'dus ma byas pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yulo// rab tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi// nyon mongs med cing mya ngan bral// spros med rnam par ma spros pa// spros pa dag las shin
195a5(mdo sde): tu 'das// yi ge'i spyod pa med pa ni// chos rnams kun gyi ra tshad nyid de/ dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na// de phyir ting nge 'dzir ces bya// zang po zo shing nye bar zhi// 
195a6(mdo sde): lhur gyis 'grub cing btsong bstan med pa// rnyog med yang dag nyi da kyi mtha'// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbeng yulo// 'od dang 'gro ba med pa dang / spros med lhan gyis grub pa yi// chos
195a7(mdo sde): rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bslabs pa ste// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bslabs nas// yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin// tshu rol dang ni pha rol med// sden mtha' rnam par
195a8(mdo sde): ma brtags te// de phyir sangs rgyas de dag sum// yon tam ngag gi pha rol phyin// 'ong dang 'gro ba med pa sa spros med lhur gyis grub pa yi// chos kyi rang bzhin pa byar ras ri// de dag
195b1(mdo sde): pha rol phyin// ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// / 
195b2(mdo sde): bam po lnga pa// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus me g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la/ 
195b3(mdo sde): bde logasu thal me sbyar ba btung ras/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
195b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ma nyam pa nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ba slab pa'i ting nge 'dzir bstan pa legs par bshad
195b5(mdo sde): pa ni mtshar te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs
195b6(mdo sde): pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ gzhon nu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod spobs par
195b7(mdo sde): gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhor nur gyur pa la skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// 
195b8(mdo sde): 'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil non cing // sdug bsngal gtses pa'i sems can gzigs nas ni// skye dgu thar byed sangs rgyas gyur cig ces// byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sems kyang bskyed
196a1(mdo sde): dpa' bos bskal pa bye bar nga spyad // sprin dang dul dang legs sngo rtag tu gnas// brjod dang tshul khrims de ba'i nang ngur 'grus nges/ spyor pa rag kyang mtha' yas
196a2(mdo sde): rgya cher byin// dang lag dang ni sreg kyang rab gtong zhing // khyod kyi yid la nam yang skyon med de// gser dngul de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang // chags med gyur nas rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong // khyod
196a3(mdo sde): kyi tshul khrims dri me brdzas ngag ste// bdag nyi gang 'ing tshul khrims yong mi 'dral// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rab tu bsdums// bder gshegs sems dul khyed la phyag 'ar lo bathang la
196a4(mdo sde): ning bzod pa'i lamal gnas// yum ri sa du byas kya zhugs re // blangs pa bsgongs pas de las 'o ma zags/ des gshegs tsho pa ra 'ong la phyag 'chas// stongs pa
196a5(mdo sde): rag gi stobs dang ldan gyur cing // chags med ye shes gnas pas chos kun rdzogs// thugs rjes 'jig rten pan mdzad chos kyi rje// skyes dgu 'di yi ngom pa rang thugs brtse ba// steng par mkhyen
196a6(mdo sde): cing 'di na sems car meng// de bzhir 'jig rten las steng gzigs ras ni// de dag rang bzhir bdag med chos rdzogs bgyis// rnam grol spos kyang gang rarang rnam grol mer// se sor rdzogs te bag
196a7(mdo sde): thams cad spangs// bdud sde mtha' yas sdebs dang ldan pa bcom// ye shes mtha' yas byang chub rgya cher mkhyen// mchog tu rnam par 'o ba'i res kyang sngon// zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i gnar
196a8(mdo sde): ljang zhing // raM dang greng du bcas pa'i sa bzhig la// namakha'i khams ni rnam pa gzhan gyur kyang // khyod ni mi bden pa'i rig mi gsung // ske dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang // sems can
196b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs ras ni// stong pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yi// dmigs pa med pa dag ni ston par mdzad// bskal pa bye ba bas ma yas su// pi dmigs pa'i bslab pa la// dpa' bo chen pos
196b2(mdo sde): bslabs pas na// khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'// ji lta bu yi chos bslabs pa// de lta bu yi chos ston te// mu stegs gzhan dag ji snyed dang // / byis pa dag gis 'di yin// bdag tu 'du shes gang gan
196b3(mdo sde): pa mi mkhas de dag 'khrul par 'gyur// chos rnams bdag red rig pas ra// khyod la 'khrul pa yod mi mnga'// dpa' bo chen po yang dag gsung // yang dag ros la rab tu gnas// mgor po
196b4(mdo sde): yang dag bden gnas te// yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung // khyed kyi smon lam btab pa bzhin// khyod kyi yang dag sbed pa byung // yang dag de yi du 'dra bas// yang dag tshig ri rab tu gsung // yang dag spong
196b5(mdo sde): ba phun sum tshogs// yang dag mtha' la shin tu bslabs// ya nga dag bsam pa yang dag spyod// yang dag ma khyed la phyag 'a rol lo// khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa reng // ye shes bsang
196b6(mdo sde): ba 'od mdzad do// ye shes khyad par rab brnyes shing // ye she sa gsung la phyag 'ar le// khyod kyis byabs pa rab bsgoms te// sems can kun gyi bshes gnyer khyod// ri rab ba'ir du
196b7(mdo sde): me sprul te/ ma~M g.ye rab tu gnas pa po// stor bar 'khor tshogs rgyu na yang // tshogs rnams dag kyang sdung pa mdzad/ shes rang zang mo bde bar gshegs// 'khor gyi nang gshegs sgra yang sbeg/ sangs
196b8(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // seng ge'i stabasu rnam par gshegs// khyod kyis mu stegs kun btul ba// seng ge yis ni wa rnams bzhir// dpa' bo ma dul dul mdzad pa// ma dul ba dag khyad kyis
197a1(mdo sde): btul// de dag mdza' sdug brdan gyur te// dbyer mi phyed cing legs par gnas// lnga ba sna tshogs gnas pa yi// sems car sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// sdug dang po sdug med
197a2(mdo sde): pa yi bdag med chos mi rnyed sder te// ma bslabs pa yi byis pa dag/ leg pa'i la pa la spong ba rnams// 'dren pa gang ras gshegs pa yi// lam yang khyed kyis rab tu bstar// bdag du 'dzer la su
197a3(mdo sde): gnas pa/ nga dag sdug bsngal lding la gnas// gang la sdug bsngal med pa yaM na// bdag med de dag mi shes so// 'khrul pa med pa'i chos tshig khyed ster te// khyod la 'khrul pa mi rnyed 'jig rjen
197a4(mdo sde): mthom// khyod rim leg pa'i tshig gsung ste// sdug bsngal mang thar mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// lha klu gdod sprin bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgya stong mang po mkha' la 'khod pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyi da
197a5(mdo sde): ldan gsung thos ras// thams cad 'drer la rab tu dga' ba sgres/ tshig ri rab tu snyar cing bzang la 'othad// mnyen zhing 'jam la yid 'ong dus rang 'byor// gsung gi yar lag dpag tu
197a6(mdo sde): meng dang ldan// par byed skye bo dang po thar byed pa// sil snyan brgya sngo nga dpag tu med pa dang // lha yi dbyangs sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog/ shin tu snyan pa dus gcig 'byor gyur kyang // bde
197a7(mdo sde): gshegs gsung gcig gis ri zil gyis rer// khyu byug bya mang 'jab pa'i sgra 'byor dang // kun la shin tu yid 'thad dbyangs sngar dag/ bya tshogs mang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa// sangs rgyas gsung
197a8(mdo sde): char yang nges mi bong// lha yaM ba me sgra dbyangs snyan par ga/ sil snyam rol me glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang // pi wang rdza rnga rje chem dung gi sgra// de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi 'od // khu brug mtsho sreg
197b1(mdo sde): sgra rnams dang // khung rung rdza ba mi 'am ci yi sgra/ sgra dbyangs yid 'ong sman pa'i yod pa/ de dgasangs rgyas gsung gi mar mi thong // sun cing mamam la yid 'ang dga' ba dang // shin tu mnyer la rab
197b2(mdo sde): bsngags zhi ba'i tshig/ dbyangs rnams thams cad dus gcig bsgrags pa bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mchog dgar 'gyur yin// lha mi mi dbang lha ma yin rnams dang // srid gsum
197b3(mdo sde): sems can mtha' dag ci yod pa// 'od byed rnams kyi 'od snang de dag ni// bde gshegs 'od zer gcig gis zil gyis non// bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa bzhin// mtshan rnams kun gyis
197b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs spros shing brgyan// bsod nams rgyas 'brub dag ci nga rnam par dang // rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu lhan// / dung gi sgra dang 'bar rnga sgra snyar dang // rnga yi sgra dang de bzhin
197b5(mdo sde): kim pa la'i sgra// rab tu 'jam zhing 'thang ba'i sgra de kun// sangs rgyas dbyings kyi brgya yi char mi phong// sil snar bye ba khrag khri gastong gi sgra// sgra skad gsal zhing mnyer ba lnga yi 'dra/ 
197b6(mdo sde): lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbangs dgar 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod // 'ang khrung rma byang chub khu byug dang // ngang pa kun la rnam mang bya'i tshogs// de dag sgra snyan dus gcig tshogs
197b7(mdo sde): pas kyang // sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi bad+ma yi char mi pad// klu dang gnod sprin lnga mir lto 'phye dang // lha dbang tshangs pa lnga yi bdag po'i sgra// sring gsum yid 'ong 'thad pa ci yod pa// de dag sangs
197b8(mdo sde): rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phong // tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang / nyim dang ni nong bu rin cher 'od// kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa du ma ngag/ 'di kun rgyal po'i 'od kyis zil gyis ron// lus dpang
198a1(mdo sde): / dang yid kyang shin tu rnam par dag/ ye shes dag pa gsum gos pa med// mi dbang yod par dbyigs tshogs yod ngan ri chen mnga'// rang 'byung yon pa thams cad kyis ni
198a2(mdo sde): med mam// de ltar stobs bcu bden pa gsung la bsod ras ni// gzhon du yid kyang rab tu dga' bas tshig smras pa// sangs rgyas gzhal med dpa g.yas la ni mchong ba yis// shAkya thub bzhin
198a3(mdo sde): bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur tshig sla// bde bar gshegs pa de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyer nas// mi dbang chags med ye shes mnga' ba 'jam pa mdzad// stobs bcu sras kyi thu bo byams pas de'us
198a4(mdo sde): te/ 'dren pas gang gi slang du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad// sa 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu yongs su g.yos// lnga dang klu rnams mkha' la 'dug cing rab dga' ste// shin tu sems
198a5(mdo sde): rang mgu bas sangs rgyas lnga zhing ris// bde gshe gas zil gyis ma nor de dag lung bstan gsol// skyes bu mchog gi ye shes gang la zhugs pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi char thos
198a6(mdo sde): ngag gis ma lags// rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes rnam dag dpe med ye shes pa lus gsungs// shAkya'i seng ge stobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'drer ba// rkang gnyis
198a7(mdo sde): gtso bo ye shes kyi 'ang pa rol phyir// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang tha ba gti mug sel// rab tu 'ong snang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags// byang chub dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir// 'dren
198a8(mdo sde): pas bskal pa gang ga yi'i kyi snyed dang // de las lhag par yang ni sprad pa rab tu spyad// gang gi ngor du 'dzum pa 'di mdzad bstar du gsol// ye shes dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir// ston
198b1(mdo sde): pas phyag dang 'bas kyang yong su mcho ba mdzad/ sras dang batshun pa gacher ba shes rtsa laga'angs pa ba'ang // thub par rnam pa bstan pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags// rnga dang ba yang dang shing
198b2(mdo sde): theng dang // bran dang nor bu dngul dang mu tig khyod kyis btang // spyod pa mchog spyod re ni khyod kyis ma btang ba// rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni gang yang med// srid pa gsum na ye shes dag ni mchog
198b3(mdo sde): tu gyur// sems can thams cad kyi ri spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// sems dang khams dang mos bdag la'ang mkhas shing rig// gang gi dor du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad/ mi yi gtso bo la ni
198b4(mdo sde): gang gis mchod// gang gi dor du rgya che yangs par 'gyur// spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab tu 'dzin// thub pa gang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan// sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// pang
198b5(mdo sde): ma bye ba 'dab ma bye bar ldan// gser gyi par ma na tu 'di gsol ba// mdzes shing yid du 'thad pas las byung // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul rab che ba// rgyal ba'i thugs
198b6(mdo sde): kyi sras po de la mchis// chos smra ba yang mang po 'dir mchis te// / 'dren pa la ni de yi slad du 'u// rnga dang dung dang khar rnga ske ren dang // sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brdungs pa yin// de dag sna ri na mkha'
198b7(mdo sde): 'di las gda'// bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni bsam mi khyab// khrung khrung dang pa ka la bing ka dang // khu byug bya tshogs mang po 'dus pa yi// sgra dbyangs rab tu sbyar ba phyung ba yang // de dag
198b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod// gang gis sprin dang dul dang legs sde pa rnams// sngon gyi bskal pa rang por bsnyen pa bgyis// gang gis mi'i gtso bo rab mchor ra// swa yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di
199a1(mdo sde): dag bstan// ri mo gus pa mchog kyang bskyed nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltang thob 'gyur zhes// gang gis dang gnyis gcol sdor ra zhus// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di da
199a2(mdo sde): bstan// stobs bcu ldan pa ji snyed 'das pa dang // da ltar byung dang pa byor bde gshegs dang // pi yi gtso bo thams cad rab tu mkhyer// de byir skye dgu'i don du zhu ba lags// sreg rags kun gyi spyod
199a3(mdo sde): yul mtha' yas dang // mi rnams gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra dang // skye dgu'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyer// de phyir mi yi gtso bo zhu ba lags// rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas
199a4(mdo sde): ye shes ji ltar theb snyam pa// sbed pa ra reg la su dag spyod pa rnams// de phyir bdag ni deng gnyis gtso la zhu// gang gis phra zhing shin tu blta dkrir chos// stong pa zhi ba marungs med bsam mi khyab/ 
199a5(mdo sde): stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul ba sgoms pa rnams// de dag slad du 'dren pa bdag zhu'o// srog chags 'gro ba bas pa yas kur gyi phyir// gang gis bya bas sapa snying rje rab bsgobs shing / 
199a6(mdo sde): gang la sems can 'ang shes med pa dag/ de phyir dang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu'o// gang dag ye shes mtshungs med bsam mi khyab// de dag la ni gzung ba yong med de// sems dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol
199a7(mdo sde): byin// de phyir mgon pi la ni bdag zhu'o// rdul khrims ye shes yor tan pha rol phyin// dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs med 'jug/ khyod la 'khrul pa dag ri ri mnga' na// su yi slad du 'dzum pa
199a8(mdo sde): 'di dag bstan/ shA ri'i bu dang ma 'gags mo ru dgal du// bde gshegs lan thos gzhan gang su mchis pa// 'di la de dag ye shes mi 'jug ste// 'di sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med/ 
199b1(mdo sde): chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin// bslab pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon par rangags// 'dren pa thugs rje dag kyang rab bsnyed la// don dam mkhyen pa gsung sgra dbyung bar gsol// sngon gang
199b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba mang por yang // skabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu gyur snyam ste// de 'dra'i sems kyis rkang gnyis gatsho dris pa// 'don pas de'i 'bras bu deng gsungs shig/ gang zag chen pos lung
199b3(mdo sde): bsngar mtshan pa'i phyir// gnod spyir srin po grul bum gsang ba po// dang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing // thams cad thal me sbar te gus par 'khod// sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba rang po nas// byang chub sem
199b4(mdo sde): dpa' 'phrul ldan mang po mchis// bde gshegs sras kyi ga tso bo thugs las skyes// thams cad thal mo sbyar cing gus par 'khod// shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir/ mi 'brags 'ang
199b5(mdo sde): phyogs 'jig rten rnam grags pa// shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mdun pad ra mchis// shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir// bi bcar
199b6(mdo sde): 'jig rjen khams mchog nas// mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang yang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig ldan cig mchis// gang dag sngan rang bskal pa bye mang sreng // ye shes dam pa
199b7(mdo sde): mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// rgya mtsho kun gyi bye ma mtsham pa yi// bde gshegs dpag tu med pa bsnyer bkur bgyis// sangs rgyas kur gyis bstod cing rab bsngags pa// ros rnams kur gyi yon dar
199b8(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin// 'jig rten phyogs rnams kun tu rab grags pa// 'jam dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar te mchis// sangs rgyas zhing du khrag khrig spyang bgyis kyang // 'di 'dra rnams ri ma
200a1(mdo sde): rnyed dkar ste// legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can// thams cad thal mo rab sbyar gus par 'khod// ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa// mkhas pa 'dir mchis
200a2(mdo sde): ci 'dra de lta bu// snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis// 'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs brjod pa gsungs// rgyal ba rnam 'drer gleng ba zhe ma mchis par// gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa mi ston na// gang gi
200a3(mdo sde): slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa// rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung dbyangs 'byung du gsel// ngang pa 'u byug rma bya sa ras// 'brug gi sgra skad khyu mchog sgra 'byin bzhin// lha yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin
200a4(mdo sde): pa/ sems can grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig/ byams pa bskyed cing dga' ba 'phel bar bgyid// ye shes ston cing ma rig sel ba ste// don la rtog cing shes rab 'phel bgyid cing / 
200a5(mdo sde): bskal pa khrag khrig bye bar rnam spong ba// rtogs pas nges bgyis dngos po rnam par bshig/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don nges par ston// mu stegs kun gyi smra ba rnam par 'dzer// stong pa
200a6(mdo sde): srog med sems can med pa sgom// bsod nams stong phrag brgya yi sa legs par brgyan// sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya yis 'dir sprad de// / lha rnams stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod/ 
200a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis// gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dang bgyid de// klu dang lto 'phye 'dab bzangs grol bar bgyid// rtag tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste// las dge'i 'bras
200a8(mdo sde): bus 'phags pa gsung phyung shig/ rgyal ba ji snyed mya ngan 'das pa dang // gang dag ma byor pa dag bzhugs pa rnams// thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen cing thogs mi mnga'// 'drer pa yor tan kun gyis
200b1(mdo sde): shin tu 'phags// 'byung po 'dzin pa 'iri dang rgya mtshor bcas// sa 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos// lha'i tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'thor// lha yaM spros dang yid du 'ong ba ldang // 'dod
200b2(mdo sde): chags zhe sdang rab rib ma lus bsngal// tshul khrims yongs dag yid kyang yongasu dag/ mtshan med rab tu zhi ba'i stong la dgyes// seng ge'i sgra skad sgrogs shig thugs rje can// spobs dang ldan zhing
200b3(mdo sde): shin tu snyan pa yangs// rgyal ba'i shes rab rdzogs shing ye shes rdzogs// thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten med// gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs// rba bya khya khu byug ka la
200b4(mdo sde): bing ka'i sgra// shang shar ti ru yi sgra yang yid 'ong ba// dga' 'gyu ra skang kun dus gcig tshogs pas kyang // bde gshegs gsung gi ma ra ri des mi 'ong // rdza dang rdza rnga bar drang bar
200b5(mdo sde): / dung dang gling bu de ba'i ba~M wang dang // sil sAr stong gi sgra rnams gcig du 'dus// de dag bde gshegs sgra yi char mi phong // lha'i sil sAr dam pa stong gi sgra// lha'i bu mo glu dbyangs snyan pa dang
200b6(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra rnams dga' ba snyed bgyid pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung gi char mi phong// 'jig rten par pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las// mos pa tha dad bzhin du sgra 'byung ste// rgyal ba bdag la
200b7(mdo sde): sngon snyam so so sems/ gang gi slang du khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad ston// lha'i sgra dang de bzhin klu'i skad // mi 'am ci yaM sgra snyan ci mchis pa// de dag nam yang tshor mongs zhi mi 'gyir// sangs rgyas gsung
200b8(mdo sde): ni rtag tu nyon mongs sel// dga' bsred cing 'dod chags dga' ma lags// byams pa snyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags// shes rab sreng cing gti mug blo ma lags// sangs rgyas gsung gis rba
201a1(mdo sde): ma thams cad sel// 'khor las slad rol tu ri sgrub 'byung // thams cad kyi yang nem nung brgya mang gcod// mtho ba ma lags dmar ba ma lags pa// thub pa'i gsung
201a2(mdo sde): snyoms shing bde ba sten// ri dang nags bcas sa 'di gas gyur cing // rgya mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin pas gyur la// zla ba nyi mas la ljang gyur kyang // rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur// tshig
201a3(mdo sde): gi yan lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung // seng ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyan pa'i dbyangs// tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bde gshegs thugs rje can// gang gi srang du 'dzum mdzad bstan du gsol
201a4(mdo sde): 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi// 'jig rten sems cer rdzi steng kun gyi yang // sems dang spyod pa kun la rab tu mkhas/ gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol// rgyal
201a5(mdo sde): ba ji snyed su rag thugs rje char// dbang dang ye shes kun gyi pha rol phyin// dri med zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni// rtag tu rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// bskal pa bye bar brjed kyang mtshungs med
201a6(mdo sde): pa gang ga'i bye snyed yon tan brjod bgyis kyang // yon tan dag gi chang brjod mi nus pa// gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan pashang du gsol// 'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// 
201a7(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'thun pa'i rigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis slar bka' sprul pa// zla 'od gzhor nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis// mtshungs pa med
201a8(mdo sde): pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pas// rtag tu 'khor mong shin tu bsngags par 'gyur// sngon yang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong byer 'dir// sangs rgyas
201b1(mdo sde): dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong // rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du 'dis// ting 'dzir zhi mchog 'di yang rab tu dris// byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di sprod pa na// 'di ni kun tu nga yi bur gyur te// thams cad du
201b2(mdo sde): yang spobs dang ldan par gyur// kun tu rtag par tshangs par spyod pa spyad// do na phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la// 'di lam par khyod nyid nga'i dbang // rtag tu tshangs spyod gtsang la gnas nas ni// ting 'drir
201b3(mdo sde): 'di shin tu rgyas byed 'gyur// ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni rab tshol zhing // lam 'dir zhugs pas byang chub des thob 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba mang pos yengs bzung ste// 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa ma rog
201b4(mdo sde): byed 'gyur// nga ni ye shes la yang rab gnas te// zla 'od sbed pa khyad zhugs lung bstan cing // 'di'i sreg dang rangs par spyod pa dag/ phyi ma'i dus la bar chang med par bya// lag 'thil ska ru
201b5(mdo sde): 'bru lnga bkod pa bzhir// ma 'ongs pa na gang lar rod 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni phrag stong dang // de las lhag par gang ba'i bye snyed shes// lha dang klu rnams bye ba brgyad cu dang / 
201b6(mdo sde): garing sprir bye ba steng phrag bdun cu dag/ phyi ma'i dus la brtson pa byed par 'gyur// rang gnyis gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso la mchod pa mchog byas te/ ye shes bla med 'di na
201b7(mdo sde): rab bsgrubs nas// byi dus lus le de mi 'jig rjem mgon// rgyal ba dri med 'ad ces bya bar 'gyur// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bdag nyid kyi// lung bstan 'di thos dga' bas rgyas gyur te/ 
201b8(mdo sde): la bdud srid du mi mngon 'phags nas// mkha' la 'dug ste cheng du brjed pa brjod// e ma N+Dal ba chos mchog stor mdzad pa// rnam grol ye shes bdag po stongs la gnas// shir tu nges pa'i ye shes
202a1(mdo sde): / cig gnas pa// pa rol rgol ba dag gis zil mi nod/ chags pa spangs shing dam par grol la reg / dngos po rnam pa shis srid par chags mi mdzad// khyod la smras pa mtha' ngag ku mi ma
202a2(mdo sde): sring pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jug spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi gos shing // lnga ba spros pa mtha' dag rab tu spangs// lam yang shin tu bskams shing gnas med pa// zil gyis mnon su dang mi 'thod
202a3(mdo sde): med// khyod mi mas gsum dag la gnas med de// chu bo dang ni mngan pa thams cad spangs// sred pa'i 'khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag bcang // srid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams spror med// chos kyi rang bzhin
202a4(mdo sde): dngos med rab ma khyer cing // brjod du med pa'i tshig kyang thug su chung // bu stegs phyir ci log la gnas bdag mi mkhas de kun ser ges wa bzhir bshig/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi
202a5(mdo sde): gar// gter mchog dam pa bdag gis ngeng 'thob ste// ngan 'gro lo ga bar ltung ba thams cad spangs// 'dran par mi 'gyur snyam du the tshom med// gser gyi kha dog mdzes shing 'od gsal ba/ 
202a6(mdo sde): byab brkyang de'i mgo la rab bzhag nas/ lhar bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dbang bkod de// maM yaM khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad// 'dzum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// 
202a7(mdo sde): denas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'ong gdor rur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhor nung lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams
202a8(mdo sde): cad las thar par bya bar 'dod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na med pa/ 'phags pa 'di la sems can rnams rab tu dgod par 'dod pas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhir mnyam pa nyid
202b1(mdo sde): rnam par spros pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya// gzung bar bya/ kun nub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod par bya/ kha ton bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i
202b2(mdo sde): bsgom pas bsgoms par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i
202b3(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni ngan song thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa/ nad thams cad las rab tu thar par byed pa yin te/ gzhon nu ram byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// chos thams cad
202b4(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin mnyal ba nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di thos shing bzung ste/ bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems
202b5(mdo sde): can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad thar par byas shing ting 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ ting 'dzir 'di yang
202b6(mdo sde): myur du 'thob po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bsngar
202b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sngor byung ba'i gtam bsten pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad do// sngon chad sprod pa spyad pa dran pa ni// bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshar bstan pa la// 
202b8(mdo sde): dge slong mkhas pa chos smra byung ba yang // de yi ming ma tshangs pas byin zhes bya// nga ni blo gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu// na bar gyur te mi bzang sdug bsngal mo// de mtshangs pas byin ba chos smra ba/ 
203a1(mdo sde): nga yi sleb dben du ni gyur pa yin// nga'i sman pa lnga brgya mi nyung ba// brtson pa'i yid kyis nang dpyad gso ba byed// nga yi nang ni gso bar ma nus nas// nga yi gnyen bshes kun kyang sngar
203a2(mdo sde): bsngal gyur// nga yang na bar dge slong nges thos nas// nad 'dri bar ni nga yi drung du 'ongs// tshangs byin pa la brtse ba rab bskyed nas// ting 'dzin mchog 'di de tshe bshad par gyur// nga ni ting 'dzir dam pa 'di thos
203a3(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa'i dga' ba zang zing med pa stes// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas// nga yang de'i dus na nang las sos// mar me mdzad ni spang ba sbed pa na// dge slong chos sla mkhas par gyur pa yin// 
203a4(mdo sde): nga ni blo gros rgyal po'i bur gyur te// ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nang las thar// de bas gzhon nu khyod kyis byi dus na/ yongasu nyams pa'ang dag rjes dran zhing // byis pas nyes par brjod
203a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bzod kyis// ting 'dzin 'di yang zung la legs par ldegs// phyi ma'i dus la dge slong mang po dag bar/ ma zhing gtum la ma bsnga ngas 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig la dga' zhing
203a6(mdo sde): lhung bzedang chos gos chags// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// rgod cing dbang po g.yengs pa phrag dog can// grong la chags shing rnyeng pa 'dod pa dag/ sbyong ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas/ 
203a7(mdo sde): nga 'dzir 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// lag pa dang ni rkang pa rnam par rdzob// rtse 'dzod gong la rtag par rab tu zhugs// gcig la gcig ni gul lung lag kyang sbrel// grong du sprod lam gan
203a8(mdo sde): dbyung bar byed/  choms sbyong ba'i ma yang 'di dag ste/ gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu mams gzugs kyis rgyams shing cu pa yong pa yin/ grong nga drang khri yul kurba tu She
203b1(mdo sde): dag bza' dang btung la rab tu zhugs// glu dang gro gar de bzhin rol mo dang // nyo 'tshong lhag par byed cing rtag tu brtson// btung ba dag la rags shing ngo ra bor// mi rigs brtson pa spring yig skur bar byed/ 
203b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims de bzhin spyod lam btang nas ni// khyim pa dag dang bsten cing khrims dral nas// de dag tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas// las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag smad pa// srang dang rang
203b3(mdo sde): la g.yo sna byed par zhugs// de 'dri'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas pas// las ngan byed pa de dag ngan song 'gro/ rung dang gser dang nor bu nor mang dang // khyim dang gnyen bshes rnam spangs rab
203b4(mdo sde): byung ste// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rang byung nas// sdig pa'i las rnams shin tu spyod par byed// nor dang 'bru la snying por 'du shes shing // bzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags// gang la
203b5(mdo sde): bslabs pa'i na ngan med pa rnams// de dag gos kyang rtsi phyir mgo bo bregs// ngas ni sngon che spyod pa spyad pam/ skal pa stong du shin tu bka' sprang de// nga yaMs ting 'jima'i ba 'a
203b6(mdo sde): btsal na// de dag de tshe 'di thos gang mos 'debs// de dag yun ring badz+ra na smra tshangs mi sprod// rtag tu rnyed la dga' zhing ngan song gzhol// tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal mnan thogs nas ni// tshul khrims
203b7(mdo sde): 'chal pa de ni chos mi smra// de dag phan tshun dbye ba'i phyir 'jug ste// rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnyed pa tshol// gcig la gcig ni mi snyan rab brjod de// shi 'phos nas ni ngan seng sar yang 'gro// de
203b8(mdo sde): dag brgya dang srong gi nga sa yang / de tshe bzod pa'i stobs ldan 'imathu sa/ de phyir 'thab la brtson pa mang po 'byung / bzod pa spangs nas rab tu spros pa byed/ byang chub sems dpa' ngas yi na
204a1(mdo sde): du s+pha// de yi sgra yang phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro// mi bder sgra yi dregs pas de rgyags te// rul khrims khams la byang chub ga la yod// gang la bsapa pa rnam par dag med cing / 
204a2(mdo sde): chos 'di la yang bzod pa med pa dang // chos rnams spong byed byang chub 'di thob pa// ngas ni ma thos nam yang yong ma mthong // de dag 'jigs shing skrag nas khyim spangs te// rab tu byung ras shin tu rab
204a3(mdo sde): du 'dzin// sres bu dam pa'i theg pa spang byas nas// bye brag lhag par 'dod pa brlag par 'gyur// shes rab dmar zhing yon tan rnam spangs pa// theg pa mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu rjod// gang gi
204a4(mdo sde): skabasu de dag rab zhugs pa// de nyid la'ang nyes pa brgya dag brjod// 'tsho ba med pa mang po rab byung ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rnam pa kun mi 'dod// byis pa de dag bdag tu lta la gnas/ 
204a5(mdo sde): stong pa nyid ri thos nas skrag par 'gyur// phan tshu na du'ang rtsod pa byas nas ni// gnod sems khong khro tha ba rab tu sbed// / phan tshun du'ang bskur ba mngon 'debs shing // sdig pa byas nas
204a6(mdo sde): shim tu dga' ba rnyed// gang dag tshul khrims gnas shing yon ldan// byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs pa// gnyi ri nang nges la shin tu bsdams pa rnams// de dag de tshe yongasu brnyas par
204a7(mdo sde): 'gyur// gang yang shin tu gtum sems ldan 'byung dang // mi bzang ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa// chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab la dga'// de dag de yi dus nar chod par 'gyur// bsgom par
204a8(mdo sde): bya zhing rab tu go bar bya// ga'ir nung la dad pa'i phyir 'brang na// bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di dran nas// de dag la ni nam yang yid mi ston// de dag 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang che// gti
204b1(mdo sde): mug che zhing nga rgyal dregs pas rgyags// lus kyang mdul dag kyang ma dul zhing / sems kyang ma dul ngan song gzhol ba yin// da ni yon tan dag gi bsngags brjod na// dge slong yon tan dag la
204b2(mdo sde): mi spyod de// tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur// nan tan lhur byed byang chub rnyed mi dka'// sngon byung ba'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// / de nas gtam 'di mthar gyur pa dang
204b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigasu bcad pas zhus pa// ri'i rgyal po bya rgod phung po ste// rtag tu sangs
204b4(mdo sde): rgyas gnas par 'de gshegs bzhud// 'jig rten sgron ma der yang gshegs nas ni// khyod la bsam gyis mi khyab mtsho nga bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa
204b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la yid kyis tshigasu bcad pas btang ba/ 
204b6(mdo sde): yi rgyal po rgyal bar mngon gnas pa// ma pham bdud rnams pham byas khyod song shig/ der ni 'gro ba kun gyi don chen yang // bla na med pa myur du grub par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
204b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis tshig su bcad pas btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba
204b8(mdo sde): byas nas/ 'khor de nas byung ste/ sangs rgyas mu med pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyed kyi 'anas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod nge mchen po 'ang na yod pa deng song ste/ phyim nas 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan
205a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i ying la/ ri'i rgyal po bya drod kyi phung po ma'am zhing yangs pa sbyar ba// sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang // gsengs
205a2(mdo sde): dang gyo mo dag med cing khor khor yug kun rin po me sna bdon du byin gyis brlabs te/ sa gzhi rin po mo an da rnyil 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab la dpe med pa'i lha'i rgyur thams cad dang / 
205a3(mdo sde): rin po ches brgyan pa/ rin po ni rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu spras pa/ dga' lngar ris kyi lha'i na bzas khyim gyi nyen 'khor brgyad cing sprang de/ bdag spos kyi snod
205a4(mdo sde): sna tshogs nas ni bdag pa 'thul bar byas/ phreng ba dang / lnga ldis ni brgyad// me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags/ rgyal mtshar dang / ba dan dang / 
205a5(mdo sde): lngab lhub bsgreng bas raM gang / khyams kyi dkyil 'kho ra du ni bla bres/ 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus su ri po che sna bdud las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te/ d+hA
205a6(mdo sde): sman las ma byas pa'i gos ni gting // ka tsa lin da ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i na bzas ni g.yogs// steng du snying po beg tsher ni bting / sngam rten mtha' gnyis
205a7(mdo sde): dmar po ni bshams/ chu zheng dang 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa btsugs te/ zhabs rten ni lha dang mi las 'das pa/ 'dzam bu'i gser las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yegs
205a8(mdo sde): pa ras rin po che bcos bus g.yogs pa/ seng ge'i khri la btags pa'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu las ri sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba gsal ba 'byung // phyogs kun tu nong bu rin po ni chen po
205b1(mdo sde): sdang bar gyur// rin po che'i gdags chen po rtsa ba ni bai dUr+ya dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ri'i
205b2(mdo sde): rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po kher yug dang bcas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa mngon par sprul nas/ skad tshig de nyid la zla 'od gzhan
205b3(mdo sde): nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stan la 'dug// de la
205b4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bya ste// raM yang lha rdzas yangs shing rgya / ri mar 'jo stengs bzang zhing dga' ba dang // bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi khyams/ dbus su mtshan se
205b5(mdo sde): ge'i khri yang btsugs lha rdzas gdugs las yid 'o/ nga sgra 'byung zhing // phyogasu nor bu rimachen 'od rer 'byung // rtsa ba yid du 'thad pa'i bai DUR+Ya// ma pham rgyal ba'i sras pos
205b6(mdo sde): de ltar sprul// ri yang rin chen sna tshogs rnam par bkra/ rin ren gdar mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam du// byams pa dpa' bos de dag rab sprul nas// skad cig de nyid la ni khyim du zhugs// 
205b7(mdo sde): de nas pacom ldan 'das 'khor cheran po rgya mo lta bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstar te/ yang dag par gzeng bstod// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ yang dag par bcud de// gang
205b8(mdo sde): las bzhengs nas gshegasaso// de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgor byung nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gang na yod pa deng gsheg+sa
206a1(mdo sde): tebyor pa dang / byams pas sprul pa'i khyabs gang na yod pa der gshegs te/ byod nas byams pas mngon par sprul pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ 
206a2(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongasu bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ lha dat+ta/ klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / drang srong dang / ra mkha' lding
206a3(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pas ni phyag byas te/ 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang na chos ston to// de nas zla 'od go zhon nur gyur pa srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
206a4(mdo sde): brgya stong thams cad lhar gyur pa rnams dang // 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig mang po dang lhan cig tu
206a5(mdo sde): me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo ni byed/ pheg ni rdob/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dar ni bsgreng / phreng ba chen po dbul ba ni thigs
206a6(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po zhi ba'i snongs byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri gang gang na yod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba deng song
206a7(mdo sde): sde phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ me tog dang / bdag pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug
206a8(mdo sde): pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gus pa dang ldan / ri
206b1(mdo sde): mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba re legasu thal mo sbar ba btung
206b2(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
206b3(mdo sde): kyis bdag la skabs bye na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon na de bzhin
206b4(mdo sde): gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ de skad ches bka' stsal te/ go skabs
206b5(mdo sde): phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams
206b6(mdo sde): cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
206b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu ches bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyuraro// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan 'di
206b8(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shing 'grogs ma bde ba yin/ dul zhing dul ba'i sa thob pa yir te/ de la pha rol gyis gshegs sam/ spros pa'i tshigaces par smra zhing / nyis
207a1(mdo sde): par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing mi mjed pa'i rang bzhir can yin/ las la lta zhing nga rgyal bcom pa dang ches 'dod pa yin te/ gnyen du chos dang po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub
207a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ tshul khrims yengasu dag cing tshul
207a3(mdo sde): khrims ma zhig pa dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang / tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims sred ma gyur pa dang / tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims mi gnas pa dang / tshul
207a4(mdo sde): / khrims pa 'phags pa dang / tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims dang / mkhas pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims yiran te// gzhon nu chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan na/ 
207a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting 'dzin 'di tho ba par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum la sems skrag pa dang / 
207a6(mdo sde): sems spangs pa dang / sems skyo ba dang / don tu mi gnyer cing mngon par mi dga' ba dang / ma chags ma zhen pa dang / khams gsam la yid stobs khams gsum las gzham du sems car sdug
207a7(mdo sde): bsngal rnams thar par bya'o zhes brtson zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang a thumadapa bya ma na mnas chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bzhon nu
207a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dang cing chos yongasu tshol bas mi ngoms pa yin/ mang du thos shing 'jigs pa med pa yin/ ches 'dod cing chos lhur byed pa yin te/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhar byed pa ma
207b1(mdo sde): yin/ shes kyi le lhur byed pa yin/ phan pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis chos ji skad du thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa gzhan la rgya cher 'chad cing rab tu ston pa yin te/ shes
207b2(mdo sde): kyi le 'dod pas ni ma yin gyi/ ci nas sems can 'di rnams chos 'di dag thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam ste/ gzhon nu chos pa'i po
207b3(mdo sde): 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyuraro// gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos
207b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'arang
207b5(mdo sde): rgya'o// gzhon nu rnam grangs 'dis/ ting 'dzin 'di ji ltar sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pA/ sangs rgyas mang po sa bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag par rab tu bsdu
207b6(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu ston pa yin te/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po'i drung dung rab tu byung nas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting
207b7(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di rgya rar mnyan te bzung ngo // dris shing bachang so// p+lag so// bton to// nyor mongs pa med pa'i bsgoms pas bsgoms shing mang du byas so// gzham la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
207b8(mdo sde): bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po nges par brjod pa'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo sngor byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di de'i tshe/ zla 'ong gnon nur gyur pa la tshigasu bcad pa'i
208a1(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ dran pa bskal pa gzhal med dpag yas ra/ rgyal ba dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra byung ste// bde gshegs dbyangs kyi
208a2(mdo sde): yan lag sgra de yi/ tshe tshad lo yang brgya phrag drag ngur gyur// de yi pha rol sangs rgyas gzhan byung ba// mi mchog mtshan ni ye shes dbang phyug ste// rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes dbang phyug ni
208a3(mdo sde): tshang lo grangs stong phrag bcu ga'iso// ye shes dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// bzi brjid dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo gzi brjid dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lo na stong
208a4(mdo sde): brag drug cu bdun// gzi brjid dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// blo gros dbang phyug ches bya rgyal ba de byung // rkang gnyis gtse be blo gros dbang phyug gi/ tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang // blo gros
208a5(mdo sde): dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rtse sa bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i dang / dbyug gi/ tshe'i tshad ni lo khri bzhi steng gyur// tshangs pa'i rang
208a6(mdo sde): phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// me yi dbang phyug ches bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo me yi dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshang lo grangs bdun khri drug steng gyur// mi'i dbang phyug pa rol sangs
208a7(mdo sde): rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal de yi// tshe'i tshad ni nyin zhag bdun du gyur// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshogs kyi dbang
208a8(mdo sde): phrug ces bya rgyal babyung // rang gnyis gtsobo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi/ tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye bar chad// tshogs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba
208b1(mdo sde): byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi// tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur tshang // dbyangs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // dang gnyis
208b2(mdo sde): gtso bo dbyangs kyi zhal gyi yang // tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag bcur tshang // dbyangs kyi zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// zla ba'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i zhal gyis ni// 
208b3(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad kyang nyin zhag gcig tu gyur/ zla ba'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// nyi ma'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo nyi ma'i zhal gyi yang // tshe tshad lon stong brag bco
208b4(mdo sde): brgyad do// nyi mir zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal 'byung // rang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang // me tshad le ni stong drag le shu'o// 
208b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i swA na pa zhes bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi// tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bco brgyad gyur// 
208b6(mdo sde): bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas 'di dag dang // 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung // zil gyis mi non de bzhin gshegs pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir yang brjod kyis mnyan par
208b7(mdo sde): gyis// mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par grags pa'i dbyangs// rnam por bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam grags sgra// sgra skad rnam grags sgra dbyangs mchod pa dang // dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa'
208b8(mdo sde): dang dbyangs dag dang // ye shes stobs dang rangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog/ zil gyis ma non ye shes yang dag 'phags// ye shes 'od 'phro ye shes mngon par 'phags// ye shes rnam grangs
209a1(mdo sde): de ba'i ye shes dpa'// tshangs pa'i stobs dang tshangs rong tshangs pa'i mchog/ rangs pa'i lhar bcas de bzhir rangs pa'i dbyangs// rangs pa'i dbang phyug rangs pa'i
209a2(mdo sde): dbang sprar// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas byin// gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjid mchog/ gzi brjid dbang phyug gzi brjid mngon par 'phags// gzi brjid khyab dang
209a3(mdo sde): gzi brjod shir tu nges// gzi brjid sgra dbang shin tu rnam grags gzi// 'jigs brtsar stobs dang 'jigs brtsar blo gros dang // shin tu 'jigs brtsan 'jigs zhal 'jigs brtsar 'pha
209a4(mdo sde): 'jigs brtsar 'od 'phro 'jigs mchog 'jigs pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rter rnam 'dren rgyal ba 'di dag byung // sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni dpal 'dzin dang // rnam dag sgra yi dbang phyug gtsang ma'i
209a5(mdo sde): dbyangs// mtha' yas dbyangs dang shin tu rnam grol dbyangs// bdud kyi stobs dang bdud rnams sreg byed dang // spyar bzangs dang ni zhal gtsang spyan dag dang // rnam par dag pa'i
209a6(mdo sde): sman dang mtha' yas spyan// kun nas spyan dang rnam par grags pa'i spyan// spun gyis zil gyis gnor dang mi smad spun// dul mchog dul dang shin tu dul ba'i sems// dul rab zhi ba'i
209a7(mdo sde): dbang po'aba'i yid// zhi ba'i bla ma zho dpal rab tu zhi// zhi ba'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'// bla mar gnas pa zhi ba dul bar sems// shin tu dul dang ni dbang zhi ba'i yid// zhi ba'i bla ma zhi
209a8(mdo sde): ba'i dpal 'bar ba// zhi ba rab ni dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'// tshogs dbang tshogs gtso tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang // tshogs rnams zil gnom tshogs bzangs ye shes gtsang // rogs
209b1(mdo sde): dpa' bo dang // gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab tu rnam par 'byed// chos kyi rgyal mtshan de bzhin chos kyi tog/ chos kyi bla mchos kyis rang bzhin 'phags// chos kyi stobs ldan chos dbang dpa' ba dang/ 
209b2(mdo sde): bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa byung // rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges par ni/ mtshan gcig pa yang bye brag brgyad cu ste// bskal pa gnyis la 'dred pa 'di dag byung // byang chub phyir ni 'di dag ngas mchod de// 
209b3(mdo sde): rang bdir chos kyi bla ma nges pa yi// rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byed cing // thos nas rnam par grags pa'i mtshan 'dzin na// de dag myur du ting 'dzin 'di thob 'gyur// 'phags pa ting 'dzin
209b4(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bab po drug pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po'i ting 'dzir gyi sgo sngor byung ba'i le'u 'ding zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa
209b5(mdo sde): la d+hi char rgyas par rab tu bstan to// sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pa rol na/ bskal pa bsam yas dpag tu med pa'i tshe// lnga mis mchod pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung // de yi mtshan ni ma
209b6(mdo sde): dbang dbyangs shes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa mi dbang dbyangs kyi ni// tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong ste// nyan thos dag ni bye ba bcu phrag gsum// de'i 'das pa dang por gyur pa yin// mngon
209b7(mdo sde): shes drug ldan gsum rig dbang po thul// mthu yang re zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/ zag pa zad pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa// 'od mdzad kyi ni dge 'dun de tshe byung // bye ba khrag khrig sdong phrag brgyad cu yaM/ 
209b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs byung // blo gros zab cing grags pa shin tu che// mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur// mngon par shes pa thob cing spobs par ldan// stong pa thams cad rtogs
210a1(mdo sde): par khong du chud// zhing ni bye bar de las lhag pa yang // gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du 'phrul gyis 'gro/ dang gnyis gcol dri ba dris nas ni// phyir yang rgyal ba de yi drung ngu 'ong / 
210a2(mdo sde): sde sgrub pa'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas// snang bar gyur pas yi steng na rgyu// sems can don phyir spyad pa rnam spyod de// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po mthu chen ni// 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis sdig pa mi bye
210a3(mdo sde): de dag la ni lha yang smon pa skyed// srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas don mi gnyer// mnyal ba zhag bsam gautan gnas pa'i spyod yul can// rnam par nges pa'i don ldan 'jigs med pa// dri ma
210a4(mdo sde): med par rtag tu rangs par spyod// tshig kyang rgyun mi 'chad cing spobs par ldan// nges tshig bstan pa'i tshigi don la mkhas// sangs rgyas sras po kun tu yang dag ston// dge ba'i
210a5(mdo sde): las rnams kyis kyang yongasu bzung // bskal pa mtha' yas par ni spyod pas 'phags// 'dren pa dag gis rtag tu ba stod cing bsngags// rnam par thar dang don tshig yang dag
210a6(mdo sde): stod// tshul khrims shing tu dag cing nyon mongs med// chu yi pad+ma bzhin du mi tshogs te// khams gsum las ni rnam grol bag yod pa// 'jig rten chos brgyad dag gis mi gos shing / 
210a7(mdo sde): lus kyang rnam dag las kyang yongasu dag/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes mthu yang che// chags pa med cing sangs rgyas yon tan gnas// sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung gnyeran te// tshig
210a8(mdo sde): tsam ma yin ran tanar snying por byed// gang la gnas pa de nyid gzhan la ston// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongasu bzung // rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod 'dzin thugs brtan pa// la
210b1(mdo sde): gsum thams cad la yang skrag pa'i yid// rab tu sems zhi rtag tu dgon par spang // 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// mdo sde bye ba phrag stong 'chad par byed// 'ard pa
210b2(mdo sde): de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig rten dag gi rig kun rnam spangs te// stong pa nyid la mos shing don dam spyod// bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho bzhi// yang du
210b3(mdo sde): thos shing mkhas pa shes rab ldan// gzhor nu bskal pa bye ba mang por ni// rgyun chad med par bsngags par ba brjod kyang // de ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur// rgya mo las ni ru thig
210b4(mdo sde): gcig po bzhin// de tshe mi'i dbang po'i dbyangs de ni// ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dag 'di stor te// stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di yang // lha dang klu rnams kyis ni
210b5(mdo sde): gang bar gyur// de yis ting 'jim ni ba 'di bshad tshe// sa ya de rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yas// lha dang mi rnams gang ga'i bye ma snyed// sangs rgyas ye shes la ni pa ldog gnas
210b6(mdo sde): der yang mi dbang rgyal po byung ba ni// dpal gyi stobs shes bya ba mthu che ba// de la bu yang bad+ma phrag lnga yod de// byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug/ rgyal po de yi btsun ro'i 'khor
210b7(mdo sde): kyang ni// bud med bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu yod// sa bdab rgyal po de ya~M bu mo yang // bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir rang ba byung // de yang stor zla tha chungs la ba la// yang lag bad+mad ldan gso sbyong bcwa
210b8(mdo sde): nas ni// bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu lhan cig tu// 'jig rten gtso bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i 'bas la phyag 'aral te// rgyal ba de yi span sngar rgyal po 'dug/ rgyal po
211a1(mdo sde): / de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas// ting 'dzin 'di ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad// ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal po ngas thos nas// rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du kur spangs te// gnyen
211a2(mdo sde): dang rtsa ba sdug pa yongs pa'ang nas// rgyal ba de yi drung du rab tu byung // bu yang brgya phrag lnga dag rab byung ste// de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras mo dang / gnyen bshes rtsa lag mang po gan
211a3(mdo sde): dag kyang // bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug byung // bu dang chung mar bcas pa rab byung nas// kha zas bsgrub pa'i sa yang bong nas ni// rgyun ma chad par lo badrud par du bachags// 'arag cing
211a4(mdo sde): 'greng bzhin 'chi ba'i dus kyang byas// rgyal po'i glang po ting 'dzin sems dpa' de// rtag par rob mnyam bzhag dus byas paso// de'ang rgyal po'i pho brang der skyes te// mngal gyi drims
211a5(mdo sde): ma gos rdzas te byung // de yi pa ni brtan pa'i stobs shes bya// blo gros che zhes bya ba mar gyur te// gzhonu btsa sa ma thag tu tshig smra ba// 'jig rten mgon po ming bzhugs sam ge/ 
211a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon pas bdag gi sems mkhyen nas// de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bshad// rkyen rnams med cing rkyen dang bral ba yang // srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams ni gcig tu bstan// chos rnams
211a7(mdo sde): kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya gang // mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig byung ba gang // byang chub sems dpa'i nor ni bla med pa// ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad ngam// lus kyang gtsang zhing de bzhin dag
211a8(mdo sde): ba// sems gtsang de bzhin lta ba go tshong ma dang // dmigs pa rnaMs las yang dag 'da' ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshang mdzad dam// chung mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan pa// lam
211b1(mdo sde): mchog yang lag brgyad ldan bsgom pa ste// de bzhin gshegs dang phrad cing shes rab rno/ bden la 'jug dang rtag tu chos shes pa// phung po yongs shes khams rnams mnyal ba nyid// ske mched
211b2(mdo sde): rnam pa kun tu bstsal pa ste// skye ba med pa mngon sum 'jug pa dag/ ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dang // so so yang dag rig pa ba'i la 'jug/ yi ge thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes dang // 
211b3(mdo sde): dngos por 'jug pa las ni 'da' ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// dbangs rnams yongasu shes shing dga' ba thob// bde gshegs bsngags pa la'ang dgar gyur cing // 'phags pa dag
211b4(mdo sde): gi tshul 'jam drang po yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// nges pa ram yang khro gnyer mi byed cing // mtshan zhing 'jam la ba'ir yang 'dzum pa ste// sems can mthong ra sngor du smra ba yi// 
211b5(mdo sde): ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dang // le lo med cing bla ma'i ri mo byed// sri zhu che bas phyag 'tshal sdug par lda// sme ba dag gis ros shes bkar ba yi// ting 'dzir ngor dral
211b6(mdo sde): bas bshad mdzad dam// 'tsho ba dag cing de bzhin dgon gan sa dang // spangs pa dag la gnas shing dra mi nyams// phung po dang ni khams la mkhas pa yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dang
211b7(mdo sde): ske mcher mkhas shing mngon shes ye shes dang // nyon mongs bsngal ba dul po'i sa rnams dang // gsang sngags mang po thams cad 'chad pa yi// ting 'drin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// srid pa'i 'gro
211b8(mdo sde): bkun las 'da' ba dang // skye ba drad zhing chos la nem nur med// chos la sems shing thos pa tshol ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// khyad par 'gro 'ang rtag tu sbrem la 'jug/ ltung
212a1(mdo sde): bdag la mkhas shing 'byung bar gnas// de la gnas pas bag la zhal ba sel// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// gang la ye shes rno ba'i ra reg 'byung ba// mi baye
212a2(mdo sde): ri bo bzhin du mi skul ba// phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan dang gzungs kyi sgo// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// rtag tu dkar po'i chos rnams yengs tshol zhing // sdig pa'i rnams kher mer rnam par
