309a2(mdo sde): la gnas pa de// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'ad bsad// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin// tshul khrims mi g.yo bskyod med gang srung zhing // 'jig rjer kun
309a3(mdo sde): tu mtshungs med bzod sgom pa// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal pa mtha' yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing // zhu ma med sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi la skems/ 
309a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs 'joms pa'i shes rang gang bsnyen pa// me tog zla mdze sa rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// lus la pangs pa thams cad rab spangs shing // de bzhin srog la ma
309a5(mdo sde): rags gyur ras ni// kun tu bzang po'i nags nas babs nas su// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khang 'dir bsad/ lha yi cho de'i snying rje thos nas ni// dge slong de kun shing
309a6(mdo sde): tu sdug bsngal nas// me tog zla mdzes nyes med bsad pa la// lta ba'i phyir yang thams cad grong du lhags// nges pa de dag rgyal po'i khab 'ongs nas// dge slong dum bu dum tha
309a7(mdo sde): byas mthong ste// nyar thag skad kyis mi zang tshe nges 'debs// de dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyel// dge slong dge 'dun rgyal po de la smra// tshul khribs snod med shin tu bsdus
309a8(mdo sde): pa yi// dge slong 'dis ni nyes pa ci zhig byas// 'di'i sngoran gyi sgrib bsam yas dran// 'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol phyin// 'di ni 'dus byas 'di dag sdong par shes// 'di ni
309b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston// 'di ni smon lam 'du shes thams cad spangs// 'di ni yid 'ong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin// 'di ni des shing dbang po rab tu zhi// 'di ni sngon gyi gnas
309b2(mdo sde): kyi pha rol phyin// 'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon par rangags// 'di ni sangs rgyas rang byung ye shes kyis// khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mor byas// dag cing rang rib med pa'i
309b3(mdo sde): mig gis lta// byams pa dang ni snying rje shin tu che// 'dod pa ngan cing brtsogs la sdug bsngal bskyed// mthe ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste// 'dod pa bsnyen na rna ba med par 'gyur// mi dag
309b4(mdo sde): shes rab dang yang bral bar 'gyur// mi rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na// long bar 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang gsod// 'dod pa bsnyen byas tshul khrims ldan pa gsod// de bas mi yis 'dod
309b5(mdo sde): pa rnam par spang // rgyal pos 'dod pa dag ni gnyen byas na// sa ba dag dam pa 'byor pa 'di bor nas// mi zang sdug bsnga la rtsub byed sems dmyal nas// sems can dmyal ba
309b6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa chen por 'gro/ 'di 'dri'i dge slong mkhas pa gsod byed de// sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu byed par 'gyur// de phyi ra byang chub zhib su 'dod pa// sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs
309b7(mdo sde): spang bar bya// lus ni sbrum gsog dang 'dra ba dang // de bzhin na mig sA lde riganas ni// gzugs dang sgra dang nga bzhin dri mchog dang // reg bya chos rnams zhus med sems kyis gtong // spyir ba
309b8(mdo sde): bslabs shing tshul khrims mnyam pa med// bzod pa dang ni de bzhin brtson 'grus te// bsam gter sten cing shes rab pha rol song // sems can ngag gi dor kyang rab tu byed// 'jig
310a1(mdo sde): chen lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang // byams pas rgyal ba la'i rab tu lnga// de phyir mig 'i mun napa gtibs gyur kyang // byang chub zhi ba nyid ni 'tshang rgya 'gyur/ 
310a2(mdo sde): dang bal glang yang thog dri rnams dang // khyogs dang sngas rnams kyang ni de bzhin te// glang po dag dang gzhon dang dgal ba dang // grong dang yul 'khor dga' bas gtong bar byed// grong khyer
310a3(mdo sde): dang ni rgyal srid yongs gtong zhing // gser dang dngul dang shel dang byi ru dang // de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu me dang // rang gi mgo yang gtong 'ang byang chub zhugs// me tog dang ni spos
310a4(mdo sde): dang bdug pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lha yaM ba ngan dang // rol po'i rabyang sna tshogs thogs nas na~M// dga' nas ma rtog pa mtshungs pa med pa byed// srid pa dag ro stong
310a5(mdo sde): par shes nas kyang // srid pa'i 'gre ba dag la dga' mi byed/ dbyer stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyar cing // phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar byed// byang
310a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// 'dod pa'i khams rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams// gzugs med khas la de dag pa chags te// khams gsum dag la snga nas rab
310a7(mdo sde): pa med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// bdag tu 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// srog du 'du shes gang zag 'du shes med// tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres
310a8(mdo sde): rtag tu spyad// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// dngos por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med// bde bar 'du shes mi bder 'du shes med// grangasu 'du shes grangs
310b1(mdo sde): med 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med// bud med 'du shes skyes par 'du shes med// grong gi 'du shes
310b2(mdo sde): grong khyer 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// yul 'khor 'du shes grong 'dab 'du shes med// 'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med// 
310b3(mdo sde): zhe sdang 'du shes sdang bral 'du shes med// gti mug 'du shes rmongs bral 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// nga rgyal pa rgyal bral ldang shes med/ 
310b4(mdo sde): ma rig ma rig ma yin 'du shes med// lha dang lta ba ma yin 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te// byang chub
310b5(mdo sde): yan lag bsam gtan chags pa med// khams gsum nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong // 'dod chags chags med zhe sdang gtum pa med// gti mug rmongs med
310b6(mdo sde): rtag tu g.yo mar 'gyur// sangs rgyas stobs bcu mthong nas bkur bsti byed// blo gros ldan pa mtho ris smon mi byed// su dag gzhan las chos mchog thos ras ni// de la nam
310b7(mdo sde): yang mem nur mi byed pa// 'bru mar gang pa'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag/ bcad dang ma bcad gzhan gyi blo yang shes// mdza' ba byas na rje su chags pa skye// de yang tshon mongs pa'i
310b8(mdo sde): chen po yin// zhe sdang byas na long khro skye bar 'gyur// dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung // 'di gnyis rab tu rnam par spang byas te// rje gros ldan pa rab ri byang chu
311a1(mdo sde): zhugs// de dag mi yi gyur chog stobs bcur raM// 'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur// nang dang phyi rol dag kyang rnam spangs te// rjes kyi ngo bzhir
311a2(mdo sde): rab gnas shing // rdul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs// ral ba med cing ma 'dres sgor yang med// ram yang de dag gi ni tshul khrims dag/ 'phags shing 'dres pa
311a3(mdo sde): ngag du mi 'gyur te// mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas// blo gros 'chang ba byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin// dge slong gi dge 'dun la
311a4(mdo sde): chos smrab me tog zla mdzes kyi yon gyi bye brag chen po yangs shing rgyar ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la tshig su bca
311a5(mdo sde): pas slar smras pa// chags khrod stug po kun tu bzang po ni// sA nga po chan pos gang zhing 'bras bu mdzes// dus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyar// sna tshogs tha da
311a6(mdo sde): bya rnams sgra yang 'byin// gser gyi ri yang mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan// mi 'am chi'i glu dbyangs snyan pa dang // rol me shin tu thabs ldan yid 'ong grag/ grub pa'i bu
311a7(mdo sde): mo rtag tu gar yang byed// nags de lha'i dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te// gzugs parang gzugs 'bar ba'i shing gis dkrigs// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad bkram// ud
311a8(mdo sde): pa la pad+mos brgyan chang chu yang 'bab// 'di 'dra ba'i nags mchog nyams dga' ba// drang srong rtag tu gnas par 'thun pa dag/ bor nas sems can don dang phan bzhed pas/ 
311b1(mdo sde): sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon// de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di// me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te// byon nas sdig pa 'gyid pa bdag gis dkrongs/ 
311b2(mdo sde): ni bdag kyang dmyal bar ltung // byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang // dpa' bo sems can pan phyir 'jig rten spyod// de dag sdig 'gying bdag gi skyabs mdzod
311b3(mdo sde): cig / byang chub sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mi cha'o// gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa ni// gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste// zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin
311b4(mdo sde): padang bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na kun dga' ba
311b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen pos lus dang srog lam chags par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo lus dang srog la chags pa'i sems can
311b6(mdo sde): rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rtag tu rul pa'i las 'di dang / sreg kyang g.yo zhing dbang med// rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra ba la// 
311b7(mdo sde): sems can gang dag chags pa ni// shin tu ma rungs las byas nas// gti mug dbang song de dag ni// sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par// mi mkhas bdud kyi gau zhol bas
311b8(mdo sde): song / dbu ba rdos 'dra'i lus dang ni// chu yi chu bur 'dra srog la// mi gang chags par mi byed pa// de dag 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// 
312a1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po ting 'dzin 'di 'ded pa dang / rlung
312a2(mdo sde): du bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rna bar 'dod pas/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar bya ste// mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bras brdzan
312a3(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pas// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed// dper na dben pa na bang bar gnas pa dang / dgon pa dang // nags khrod spangs te/ gleng dang / phreng khyer
312a4(mdo sde): dang / grong brdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'o pho brang 'khor dang / ri khrod rnamasu zhugs te/ ci nas sems can de dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / rang
312a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams la
312a6(mdo sde): chos bstan par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la snor byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgya cher tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas
312a7(mdo sde): bar rab tu bstan to// ngas sngon spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na// de tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin par gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes bya// skyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung bar 'gyur/ 
312a8(mdo sde): shing rta zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong // kun ras mdzes shing lta na sdug pa ste// sum chu rtse gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa// phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar byed// re
312b1(mdo sde): tog zla mdzes phyogasu grags pa ste/ snying rje gnas pa rab pan snying brtse ba// dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis mdzes pa ni// sems can rnams la brtse phyir grong du 'ongs// nga ni
312b2(mdo sde): gzugs kyang de tsham mi phod pas// de la nga yang 'jungs pa ma rungs skyes// 'dod la chags shing sring la bcings pas ni// 'di ni bdag gi srid las skyong snyam ste// nga yi bu rnam
312b3(mdo sde): sdong du tshangs pa yang // shing rngang zhugs shing zham ring mthon dman 'gro/ cod pan dang ni sna tshogs rgyun gyis bad+yAn// sum cu dbang phying lnga yi bu 'drong ba'i na de na nga yi bu mo lnga
312b4(mdo sde): brgya dag/ nor bu thogs shing lham gyon blta na sdug/ mgo d+hun dang ni lngab lngabargyan gyis spang // de dag gser gyi dra bas shing rnga 'drar// nga yaM bud med dag ni brgyad khri yang // gzug
312b5(mdo sde): mdzes shin tu blta na sdug pa dag/ shing rtar nu gas pas dge slong de mthong ste/ ri rang bzhin du gzugs bzang dpal 'bar ba// mthong nas de dag par yang
312b6(mdo sde): 'du shes bskyed// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skyes te// de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud// yid du 'ong ba'i rgyun rnams de la gtor// de tshang ni phrag dog skyes
312b7(mdo sde): par gyur// gdong sems le snang thab mi bzang de// dbang phyug rgyags pas bu la 'di skad byas// mdun na 'dug pa'i dge slong gsang par gyis// gzho ru de dag nga yis tshig
312b8(mdo sde): ras shin tu sdug bsngal yid kyang mi dgar gyur// yab cig de skad kyi ni tshig ma gsung // dge slong 'di 'dra bdag cag mi 'gum so// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye sted du/ 
313a1(mdo sde): bdag cag lus dang yan lag bcang btubs kyang // dge slong 'di ni 'gum par ma bgyid de// 'di ltar bdag chag byang chub sems skyes so// rgyal ba
313a2(mdo sde): bu yis tshig thos nas// khres te bsed pa'i gshed ma 'phags la smras// nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi// dge slong 'di ni myur du song de phul// de nas bsod pa'i gshed
313a3(mdo sde): ma byi bzhin 'ongs// shin tu gtum sems dpa' byed snying rje med// 'bru sang ngang btags ral gri thogs nasu// de yis dge slong dram bu brgyang du byas// de yi lus dang yin
313a4(mdo sde): lag bcad pa las// khrag kyang mi zag 'od gzer stong byung ste// bcad pa'i 'phro nas dpal be'u 'khor lo dag/ mtshar rnams de yaM las kyi rang du yod// shin tu ma rungs las
313a5(mdo sde): ri byas nas su// bskyed mos tshal du de yi mod la byung // dge slong me tog zla mdzes dran nas ni// de yi rtsed mo dga' bar ma gyur to// rings pa'i gzugasu myur zhing
313a6(mdo sde): 'gyogs par ni// de nas bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang seng // gang du dge slong dus bu brgyad byas pas phyogs der ni shing rtar zhugs nas phyin// lha rnams khrag khrig pang po bar snang
313a7(mdo sde): la// chongs 'debs pa'i sgra dag de thos te// rgyal po khyod kyis mi dge sdig mang bgyis// shaM 'phos nas ni mnar med mi bder 'gro// rgyal po des ni lha'i sna thos nas// shin tu sdug
313a8(mdo sde): bsngal mi dga' sems skrag gyur// bdag gis me tog zla mdzes bkrongs pa ni// bdag gis sdig pa mi bzang mang po bgyis// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan// 
313b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog sras po gang // dbang po bsrung shing nges pa zhi ba'i yid// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin cing / 
313b2(mdo sde): zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod// 'jig rten kun tu chos kyi sgron ma mdzad// de ni 'dod pa'i ngor byer bdag gis bkrongs// 'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal po gang // sems
313b3(mdo sde): can rab rtag tu gse byed cing // bdud rtsi dag gis babru sman gtong ba yi// dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don byed bkrongs// zhib cing zab la zhi ba lta dka' yi// ches rnams skye dgu
313b4(mdo sde): ngag la gang 'arang cing // byang chub snying po mchog kyang gang ston pa// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis dkrongs// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing // 'jig rten mdongs pa'i
313b5(mdo sde): smin mar gyur pa ste// gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa// de ni chi slad bdag gis 'ded phyir dkrongs// chen mongs med cing rnam ga ye shes can// zhi bar bzhi
313b6(mdo sde): rje su mal ma bzhag pa// 'dod pas mdongs pa dag gis dang bkrongs te// des ni shin tu ma 'dus dmyal bar ltung // sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang de bzhin pa byed dang // maM
313b7(mdo sde): dam pa rgyal ba gang yang bzhugs pa ni// bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan d+ha mtshe ldan pa rnams// de dag kun la thal mo sbra de skabasu mchi// // 'phags pa ting 'dziran gyi rgyal
313b8(mdo sde): po'i meng// / bam po bcu gsum pa/ de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes bsad de/ shi ba'i lus kyi mngag pa gyur pa sa la 'gyel cing 'dug pa
314a1(mdo sde): mtha' ras/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ 'gyor cing mes par gyur nas/ de'i tshe ma nges rab tu cher btab po// chos smrab me teg zla mdzes pa la yang 'ang lnga
314a2(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bskyed pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag slaso// kun tu bzang po 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis// khyed la rnam pa mang po bsgre ba bgyis
314a3(mdo sde): khyed kyi sreg gi bar rang byung re// ri ma na ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma ba 'ang // khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung // mgon po grong khyer du na ci spang byen// khyed ni gang ba der du
314a4(mdo sde): byon pa yi// des de snyen ma mdzad du gsol// lha rdzas mig gu sna tshogs brgyan pa yis// gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljin mang pos dkrigs// grub pa'i reg 'jam par
314a5(mdo sde): spyor mchog gis bslangs// lha rnams bzhugs dbyat+pal s+thA yang sgeg/ kun tu bzang po sangs rgyu sa rba gzhugs pa// nags tshal dam pa dga' ba bar nas ni/ 
314a6(mdo sde): ba gang phyir khyed ni 'dir byer pa// nges pa bgyi ba de dang bdag la gsungs// khyed kyi tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhir bgyi// sangs rgyas sras po bzhengs la bka' spel tshig/ kye ma de ni
314a7(mdo sde): brgya lha yi lnga// bdag ni mgon med khyed kyi skabasu mchi// gcig pu seng ge ri dwags rgyal po ltar// dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khya bar nas// sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs
314a8(mdo sde): brtse'i phyir// rang gi grogs kyang bdang sde 'dir byen na// 'dod chags zil non shin tu 'jungs pa yis// bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur 'chang // 'dir mi dge slong dge 'dun mtha'
314b1(mdo sde): ngas kyang // khyed la lnga bar 'i brang ma lhags par// bdag ni 'jigs skrag khyed la tshi gsol ba// de bar gsol ba gcig ni mdzad par 'os// me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsal la/ 
314b2(mdo sde): mdus zla ba la 'drar bzhengs su gsol// sems can gatsho bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod// chos smra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol// de ring bdag la sna tshig snang bar mdzod// nyi ma bzhin du snang mdza
314b3(mdo sde): bzhengasu gsel// chos smra mchog ni bdag gis dkrongs bgyis te// sdig pa ma legs bdag gis der bgyis pas// 'di nas 'chi 'phos mi bzang dmyal bar skye// bdag la de yaM skabasu
314b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba med// nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung // / rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung // thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di nas bdag gis snying po
314b5(mdo sde): tshi me blangs// 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnam dang chos// snyan par gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can/ 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byir mi mdzad pa// me tog zla mdzes
314b6(mdo sde): bdag gis ci phyir dgrangs// kye ma bzod dang bka' thub ner phyogs brtul zhugs bzang // kye ma gzugs dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan// kye ma g.yo med dpal stag spros pa mi
314b7(mdo sde): mngara' ba// bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad// 'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bachad pa na// 'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung // 'jig rngar 'di dag
314b8(mdo sde): thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar gyur// ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengasu gsol// kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can// kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri be tshur/ 
315a1(mdo sde): ma chos rnams zab mo shin tu ston pa'i mchog/ lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs rjer mdzad du gsol// kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshul sprin cig/ kye ma sa bcu leg
315a2(mdo sde): gnas tshur spyon cig/ kye ma dpa' bo stobs brgyas mngon 'phags pa// tshe la khyed dbang bdag po gang du bzhud// kye ma dpa' bo tshur spron bdag la gsungs// khyed kyis yun ring bzod pa
315a3(mdo sde): bsgoms pa dang // brtson 'grus thugs rje de dag gang du mchis// byams pa chen po bzhengs las gsung phyung cig/ kye ma shin tu mchod 'os lnga'i lha// ches smra cang mi gsung bar
315a4(mdo sde): ci slad bzhugs// mkhas pa bzhengs la bdag gi khyim du bzhud // bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston tshig/ lha khyod lus ni gachad par mi nus te// lha dang lha min gnod sbyin
315a5(mdo sde): srin pos kyang // khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis// mkhas pa khyod deng sgyu dag ma mdzad cig/ lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga la gda'// byang chub sems
315a6(mdo sde): dpa' sgyu ma mi mdzeso// sgyu ma thams cad spongs la bzhengasu gsol// rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod tshig/ kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes chur// kye ma khams gsam
315a7(mdo sde): 'dod chags bral ba tshung // kye ma pa ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur// bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni gcad du gsol// ngan seng skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung // sreg chags mnar med chen por
315a8(mdo sde): ltung ba yi/ sbubs mdzad me teg zla mdzes nur spyod cig bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol// mgor po khyod ni dgung 'dun pa shos pa gsol// re shig reng bzhengs bdag kyi
315b1(mdo sde): shes mas la tshig bdag gis pa shes gsol chen ldan pa 'dam/ sems can du mam la dgod par mdzod// rgyamachos mchogardzogs pa bdag gi yang // kyis sems cas
315b2(mdo sde): la khon med sems// kye ma tshur sbyin bdag mdun chos ston cig/ kye ma tshur spron khyod smon myur grub shog/ dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med gyur// kye ma mdongs shing mi dran mya ngan 'gyid
315b3(mdo sde): sems can snying po khyod ni myur bzhengs la// dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang 'byung ba mdzod// kye ma 'jig rjed gsum na spen gyur pa// kye ma chur spyon kun tu bzang por bzhud// kun tu
315b4(mdo sde): bzang po'i nags khrid bzhung nas ni// dge slong dag la pa na phyir khyod stor cig/ kye chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung che// a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'// shes rab
315b5(mdo sde): thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa// kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigasu gsol// tshig gis lam dang bral ba'i gzungs de yang / kye dge slong dag la bsdum du gsol/ kye
315b6(mdo sde): zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir// me tog zla ba de ring bzhengasu gsol// kye kye rgyal sras bdag la thugs brtsa ba// 'gro ba'i dbugs 'byin mdzad pa bla na med// kye kye mtshan dang dbyug
315b7(mdo sde): pas btab pa bzod// bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu nges// kyai med tog zla mdzes thugs rtse chan// rang sbyin 'dres pa khyod ni bzhengasu gsol// kye khyod ri bzhengs la bdag la yang
315b8(mdo sde): mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol// kye 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog/ kye sems can ngag gi ngan ngon la// btsom
316a1(mdo sde): mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stabs bcwa lngas/ kyi kyi chog bla mdzes bzhengs su gsol// dpa' bo sems cam ngag pa na mdzang pa/ kyi gyi sems can dang
316a2(mdo sde): ba dang // khrag khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i grong ngu khrod // kye kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che/ mkhas pa bslab pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug/ kye kye tshul khrims dajal zhugs rab ba
316a3(mdo sde): / chos kyi shing gi myu gu mngon par dga'// kye kye chos gos ngur mr-ig la bskur 'chang // rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzod// kye kya me tog zla ba brtul zhugs bzang / 
316a4(mdo sde): sbyin dka' thub bzang po byed bzhengs shig/ kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dug/ jug par dul ba'i gnas dang rje su ldan// kye kye dul ba rab rdul rjesu brdum/ 
316a5(mdo sde): zhib rab zhi 'ang nas des// kye kya sems can nyal zhing gnyid log pa// chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sang par mdzod// kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag/ sang par bgyis nas theg pa
316a6(mdo sde): mchog la khong// kye kye sbyin pa yin spang leb la// brtson 'grus tha gus sbrel ba'i gru sbyor te// kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni// rab tu lhung zhing sred pas dad pa rnams// kye
316a7(mdo sde): stobs bcu ldan pa me tog mchog/ gnyan pa gdos 'dzin mkhas pa bzhi ngasu gsol// kye shin tu sra ba'i glur yang ni// zhugs nas bdag dang de dag bsgral bar
316a8(mdo sde): mdzod// kye sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la// shin tu spyad cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog/ kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin// dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi ngag sbyin mthod pa/ 
316b1(mdo sde): kye kye 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// btab ba'i sems can na pa rnams gzigs nas// kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la// chos kyi sman rnams shin tu stsal bar mdzod// kye kye ye shes smar pa
316b2(mdo sde): rgyal po mchog/ mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin// kye nang rnams shin tu gso mdzad cing // thugs rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad// kye gyen par gyur pa'i sems
316b3(mdo sde): can byams// 'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa'i rnams// des ni sems can thams cad bde ba dang // nad rnams med ching mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// kye kye mkhas pa ye shes rgya
316b4(mdo sde): chen bslabs// chos kyi rnga dag shin tu rdung bar mdzod// kye kye 'jig rten gyis ni the tshom gyi// 'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos tshad// kyai legs thos ches rnams 'dzin mdzad pa
316b5(mdo sde): rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang // 'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab zhugs la// mi mchog ma la sa pa brjod pa mdzad du gsol// me tog zla ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye/ 
316b6(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po brgyad chu tshangs pa kye// dpe bya da bzang po brgyad chus lus brgyad kye// srid pa'i ma tshe rgal spros med tshur spyon kye// srid pa'i btson rar tshung khrol ba zhengs shig
316b7(mdo sde): kye/ ye shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye// me tog zla ba thugs rje chen po kye// byams dang snying rje snyed la bzhengs shig kye// me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs// dge slong dge
316b8(mdo sde): 'dun khyod kyis mdor bar// tshur gshegs dge 'dum yongasu bsdu ba mdzod// bzhengs la nags khrod der yang gshegs sam kye// me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mchog 'dza'
317a1(mdo sde): rang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing pam// gzungs la rab tu gnas pa chur spyon kye// ye shes sdeng pa la tshungs med khyad ba nangs shig/ ri ba 'ar du me
317a2(mdo sde): brtan bkye// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mamapa yid kye// me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pa kye// bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'chang rgya marjod// lha yi rnang chos kyi mchog 'cha kyi/ 
317a3(mdo sde): lnga yaM maMg mkhas ye shes tshogs pa kye// bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig thug rje can// grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson gyi// 'jig rjen kun la phan dang don mdzad kye/ 
317a4(mdo sde): matog zla ba shin tu sprin dgyes kye// bzhengs la myur du bdag gir rdzogs mdzod/ khyod 'dir dum bu dum bur ma bzhugs shig/ grong 'di skyes pa bud med tshegs rnams kyang // khyed
317a5(mdo sde): mthong thams cad shi bzhin sa la 'gyel// sIng de mas 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid// thubs rje mchog gi spyan gyis de la gzigs// gang gi slad du byams
317a6(mdo sde): pa bsgom pa dang // ye shes shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang // khyod kyi thugs rje btang snyoms dga' ba yangs// de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes// wAR+Ya
317a7(mdo sde): lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // gnod sbyin srin po mi dang mi 'am ci// snyam pa me tog bdug pas bkang nas ni// thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lpags shing 'khod// drang srong chen
317a8(mdo sde): po'i tshig ni deng rdzogs te// skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin// yid kyi nang du 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu// de phyir 'dod pa'i spyo ba spang bar bya// dge slong bdag gis gas
317b1(mdo sde): pa'i sdig gi las// shin tum legs mi bde byas pas na// bdag ni mi zad dmyal ba man zed 'gro/ bdag la de mi mgon sbubs byed pa med// radag ni rgyal po'i sring bdang
317b2(mdo sde): spyang gzhi la// spos dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni// mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya// shin tu mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya// bu dang bu mo bud meng khyab bdag
317b3(mdo sde): dang // byin po dang ma tshong dperan de dag dang // grong pa dang ni rgyal rigs mang po rnams// de dag thams cad la ni ngas bsgo ba// a ka ru dang can ngan shub pa dang / shin tu rnam pa
317b4(mdo sde): sdes mchog ci yod pas// myur du sbrel gyi nang du khyogs ches la// dge slong 'di ni bsreg pa'i chog gyis// grong khyer mi kun rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// spos mchog
317b5(mdo sde): dam kyang thegs nas mas chis // sras babang ma yad du 'ongs las byas// de mi nga slong nga yang brgyag nas su nga
317b6(mdo sde): sprika de bzhin pa 'al// me tog dang ri 'phreng ba byug pa dag/ shin tu bzang dang 'bru mar dag gis bsregs// de yi rus pa sgrom ni byas par gyur// dge slong dag gis de yang
317b7(mdo sde): der bsregs te// rgyal pos de yi mchod rten byas nasu// 'di la ngas ni mchod pa bya zhes zer// me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dag/ gdugs dang ba da rgyal mtshan thegs nas
317b8(mdo sde): su rgyal pos dang ni sil sngan steng ngag dang // bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang len du btsud// nyi ma gcig la rgyal po dus gsum du/ dge slong de yi mched rjer de dung du
318a1(mdo sde): sdig pa sngan chad chung zad ci byas pa// de ra dus gsum du yang shin tu 'chags/ le steng bye ba drag ni dgu bcu lngang// nyes pa byas pa dag kyang ra
318a2(mdo sde): bshegs te/ phyis kyang tshul khrims dam pa ma ral bsrungs// rnam par dag cing gatshang la dri ma med// lo spang bye ba drag ni dgu bcur yang // gso sbyong dag kyang nga tshe
318a3(mdo sde): gsos te// de ni de tshe bdag gi lus zhig nas// mnar med mi bzad par ni der lhung gyur// 'dod phyir snying rje med pa'i las byas pas// sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myed pa
318a4(mdo sde): gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu lnga// de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas// lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu rtsa lngar// de yi tshe na nga ni long bar gyur// bskal pa bye
318a5(mdo sde): ba drag khrig drug chu gnyis// sngon chad nga yi mig kyang bcang bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig pra ga stong dang // shin tu mang par nga yi mig phyung phrog/ ma
318a6(mdo sde): dang rna ba dang ni rkang lag kyang // bskal pa mtha' yas khrag khrig bachad par gyur// bskal pa dag ni bye ba khrag khrig du// mir gyur pa dang skye ba bzhin du'ang // 'khor ba'i sngar
318a7(mdo sde): bsngal dag gis rab gtses shing // sdug bsngal tshor ba yun ring myong bar gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams byas pa 'khor ba na// yun ring shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de phyir
318a8(mdo sde): byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa// srid pa gsum du sdig pa mi bya'o// rgyal po'i mchog gis sngon gyi las bshags kyang // snga mi'i nyes byas rnams las nga ma thar// mi bzang gzugs kyi wa
318b1(mdo sde): rnams sngar byas pas// de shaM dmyal ba mi bzang mnar med seng // nga yis rna ba de bzhin dang lag bcang // bskal pa mtha' yas mang per sna yang bcang // sbed pa sbed tshe mngon
318b2(mdo sde): cha dbyig thegs nas// 'debs byang rar gyis nga yi mig kyang phyung // byang chub phyir ni mgo lag lus bcad dang // bu dang chung ma rig dang rang gi sha/ dang lag dga' ba'i sems
318b3(mdo sde): kyis yengs btang yang // sder gyi sdig pa'i las ni zang ma gyur// kun dga' de ltar bskal pa mtha' yas spyod// sangs rgyas dpal sdug dpag tu meng ba mthong // byang chub spyod
318b4(mdo sde): mchog 'di ni spyod pa na// de tshe sdug bsngal 'di dag sder myong gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas shing // byams spyod rtag tu mi g.ye ma 'gul ba/ 
318b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rdul spangs lha'i lha ba rong ras// de dag rang yang ngan song sar mi 'gre/ sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ran gyi go bgos pa// res rje sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur su
318b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa// tshul khrims ma 'dres g.ye ba med par srungs// gzungs la rab gnas chos kyang bstan par gyis// nga ni de tshe rgyal po dpas sprin yin// nga yi bu rnams pi dus ches phreng ba// 
318b7(mdo sde): med teg zla mdzes pad+ma bla ma yin/ dga' byed de ni'i ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'jig rjer gsum dpa' 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pa// de zizhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur/ 
318b8(mdo sde): ste dgu dag gi der chen mdzad nas ni// mar me bzhin du 'drer pa mya ngan 'das// bud med tshogs dang rgyal rigs mang po dang // khyim bdag dang ni blon po stobs chen dang // rong dper
319a1(mdo sde): de bzhin grong pa'i mkhar gyi rgyal// thams cad stobs brgya nyan mongs med par gyur// me tog zla mdzes kyi le'u ste/ sum cu ma drun// de nas yang
319a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis// zla 'a ba'o nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhan nu de lta bas na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
319a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub bde bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros
319a4(mdo sde): pa'i ting 'dzin 'di nyar par bya// gzung bar bya// kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya// lung mnod cing kha ten du bya/ nyon mongs pa med
319a5(mdo sde): pa'i bsgom pas mang du bsgom par bya// gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// tshul khrims kyi phung po la yang rab tu gnas par bya'o// de nas
319a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims tshogs gnas shing // bdag la phan sems spyad pa gang spyod pa/ mngon dpa'i
319a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing du myur song nas// bzod pa des thob chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// de phyir gnod sems med cing kun 'thun gyis// thams cad rtag tu yi du 'ong bar bgyis// dpa' stag sa ng+yas
319a8(mdo sde): dpag med mthong nas ni// byang chub reg nas chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// de phyir phan yin mchog 'di thos nas ni// dge slong tshul khrims mchog dang ldan mthong na// mkhas pas g.yo
319b1(mdo sde): med rtag tu bsten par bya// ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin 'di 'thob 'gyur// gal te gter rnams dpag med tshad kyang med// rin chen sna bdun nor bus gang gyur pa// de bzhin zhing rnams
319b2(mdo sde): gang+ga'i bye ma rnyed// nor bu rin po che yos gang ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa' sprin la mos pa yis// nyin mtshan rer smin pa 'di dag byin// de bzhin bskal pa gang+ga'i bye ma snyed// 
319b3(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'ard par smin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting 'dzin 'di// thos nas bder gshegs mdzod mchog 'dzin byed pa// bsod nams phung po des ni gang
319b4(mdo sde): bzung ba// sbyin pa de kun de yi char mi phod// mi gang rje su 'thun la dad pa dag/ ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// bsod nams phung po dang med mchog 'di yin// ye
319b5(mdo sde): shes mjed de dpag med 'byung gnas gnaso// ting 'dzi na rdul bral zhi ba 'di bzung ni// byang chub sems/ dpa' de ni nor chen 'gyur// rgya tsho chen po bzhin du thos pa'i
319b6(mdo sde): gter // de la bsod nams tshad yod yong mi 'gyur// chos kyi mchog rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// shin tu rgyas byas byang chub sems par brjod// ting 'dzin 'di ni su
319b7(mdo sde): ngag sten byed pa// de ni nam yang byang chub the tsom med// bsod nams phung po mchog dang gang ldan zhing // gang la tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'jig rten slob dben sangs rgyas
319b8(mdo sde): rnam par 'dren// rang byung thugs rje chen po ma gtogs par// de yis 'og tu sems can su dag kyang // steng chen 'di na bsod nams phung po dang // mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khya
320a1(mdo sde): ye shes kyis mnyam par gyur pa nam yang yong med do// ting 'dzin 'di ni thos ras 'dzin pa dang / klol cing yongs su chub par byed pa dang mnungs
320a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub tshol ma gshegs/ de yi ye shes mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing babs pa yis// bser nams phung po ji skad bsags pa yang ga
320a3(mdo sde): nu ji ste tshes de gzugs yod nas 'jig rten khams mang 'dir yang shong mi 'gyur// gzhon nu de phyir byang chub tums dpa' gang // 'das dang byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang
320a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'dod pa yis// ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing klag par rgyas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yin// / gzhan nu nga yi tshig la dang pa
320a5(mdo sde): sa// de bzhin gshegs pa brdzun gyi tshig mi gsung / 'di 'dra'i sems can rdzun du smra ba med// sngon gyi bskal pa brgya phrag bas ma ya su/ byang chub spyad pa mcheg
320a6(mdo sde): 'di rab skyed cing // ting 'dzin 'di ni yengasu tshol ba'i phyir// ngas ni bdag tu lta ba 'dir sbyangs so// de phyir chos kyi mjed 'di mnyan par gyis// 'di las mdo sde bye ba brag khrig
320a7(mdo sde): 'byung // 'di ni bsod nams phung po mtha' yas yangs// 'dis ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'theb// mkhas pa 'jigs med de dag gang sten pa// 'di ni mdo sde kun gyi
320a8(mdo sde): dam pa'i mdo// dge ba bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung gnas te// chos de rnams la mtha' thug rnyed mi 'gyur// stong chen dag ni bcad cing bshig na su// rdul gyi tshogs rnams 'grang
320b1(mdo sde): bar nus na yang // mdo sde brgya phrag bsam yas tshad med pa// rgyun mi chad par de stong bgrang mi nus// sangs rgyas zhing gi sems can thams cad kyi// phyi nang rgyu ba'i dbugs ni
320b2(mdo sde): bgrangs nus kyang // ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ston pa// mdo sde de dag mthar thug nus mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// 'gro ba der yang sems can gang
320b3(mdo sde): skyes pa// de dag sems ni bgrang bar nus kyang srid// rtag sten mdo sde de dag bgrang mi nus// rgya mche chen po'i bye maci yod dang // klung dang mtshe'u dang gshong gi bye ma dag/ bskal pa bye
320b4(mdo sde): bdag gis bgrang nus kyang // de dag 'chad pa'i mdo sde mtha' yas so// sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang pon// chu yis phung po rtag 'dug ci yod pa// brgyan la sgra yis rjem
320b5(mdo sde): bgrang nus kyang // de yi dbyangs kyi yan lag kun mi 'a grangs// gang mngon 'dir ni sems can ci byung ba// / rang gi lus la snying por 'dod pa rnams// bskal pa bye
320b6(mdo sde): ba mang pos bgrang nus kyang // de dag mdo sde sgrub pa shes mi nus// phyogs bcu dag na sems can ci yod pa// srog chags kun gyi sgra skad bgrang nus kyang // de dag rtag tu mi chad ston pa
320b7(mdo sde): yis mdo sde de dag bgrang bar yang mi nus/ chos rnams thams cad bstan par rab shes shing // nges pa'i tshig dang bstan pa'i rig don mkhas// gtan la bab pa'i yang dag
320b8(mdo sde): tshul la bslabs// blo gros yangs shing rtag dga' shes rab can// yangs pa'i don sems rab tu phye ba'i blo// bsam dang mi bsam pa yang rtag tu shes// dbyangs kyi rang
321a1(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi chen thams cad rig sgra dbyangs de dag ste kyang chags mi 'gyud// thugs med de na ches smang brjod pa ste// 'gro bkur la ster kyang rams
321a2(mdo sde): 'gyur// dri ba nges par bstan pa rgyal mkhas// de ltang de yis don dang rab tu rdzogs// mang sde gcig gi phyogs kyang bye ma snyed // bsam gyis mi khyab nges sder rags pa yar
321a3(mdo sde): gas meng sben pa tshig gi don la mkhas// 'khor gyi nang du de 'amang chags mi 'gyur// ting 'dzir 'di la legs par gang gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' nga ni baye
321a4(mdo sde): ped/ chos la stengs skyed bye brag thob pas ni// srog chags bye ba mang po'i don de byed// ji ltar ri rab mi g.yo mi 'gul te// rlung rnams kun gyis 'gul bar po nus
321a5(mdo sde): pa de bzhir dge slong chos sla mkhas pa yang // pha rol rgol ba kun gyis bskyod mi nus// stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di na// mi gang mi g.ye bar ri bad
321a6(mdo sde): ba rnams// de dag rlung gis rab tu bskyod nus kyang // su dag stong pa nyid la rnga ga tshon pa// sangs rgyas gnas su nges pa de yin te// gtan la bab pa stong pa'i ches rab shes/ 
321a7(mdo sde): da ni rgol ba kun gyis dkrug mi nus// pas kyi rgol ba dag gis mi bskyed cing // smra ba thams cad kyis kyang zil mi gnon// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bstan byas na// zil gyis ma
321a8(mdo sde): nor smad pa med par 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bshad byas na// ngo yis stong nyid rtogs par khong du chud // de ni chos rnams kun la nem nur med// ye shes mtha' yas dag
321b1(mdo sde): la 'khor med gnas// 'ang 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing blags pa na// stobs dang byang chub yan lag rnyed mi dkar// yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul bsal mi khyab// de la yang rabar shes pa
321b2(mdo sde): parnyed mi dka'// mtha' yas ye shes rgyal ba mthong ba yang // srid par grub pa dag re rnyeng mi dka'// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab// ting 'dzin 'di 'arang de yis
321b3(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur// de ni rgyal ba de dag thams cad las// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang thos 'gyur te// yang dag rig dang dbang gi pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog dang ldan pa
321b4(mdo sde): 'gyur// snying chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di ga natan gas mam pa khams sa rgyas/ ma nga mtha' yas rnam mang ji snyed pa// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser
321b5(mdo sde): bkram gang bkun// sa ya~M 'og nas srid pa'i rtsamo'i bar// thams cad rgyal ba'i mchog la m+b+hi na pa byin// sems can rnam pa mang po ji snyed pa// bskal pa
321b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas mang por sbyin pa byin// sangs rgyas rnams la 'khor mor mi chad byin// byang chub 'dod phyir byin pa'i sprin tshogs la// dge slong gang dag stong zhing ma'i dga' zhing // sdeb
321b7(mdo sde): brtsal ni thal sbyar phyag 'tshal na// byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid mngon dga' la// sbyin pa'i phung po snga mas char mi ngod// bsod nams ldan pa'i mi nges de rnyeng nas// sa ng+yas
321b8(mdo sde): byang chub mtshungs ming tshol ba'i phyir// rang ba rgyacher bskyed nas sbyin byin pa// de yis dpeng 'di skyes bu dam pas bstan// su dag 'ang 'brir dam pa'i marag 'ang
322a1(mdo sde): tshig bzhi'i tshogs bcad sems dga' 'dzin pa yang // de yaM bsod nams phung po bsags pa la// sbyin pa de kun brgya yi char mi long ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba ma
322a2(mdo sde): thos par// phan byed byang chub sems dpa' sprin byin kyang // thos pas sangs rgyas ye shes myur thob ltar// de tsam sangs rgyas ye shes myur mi 'thob// gang gis zhi mtshogs 'di thob
322a3(mdo sde): nas su// rdul bral zhing 'dzin stong pa'i rigs 'dzin no// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' rdzogs byed pa// des ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob// gang gis 'di lta bu yi gte
322a4(mdo sde): rnyeng pa// zhing rnams mtha' yas gang+gA'i bye ba snyed// de dag lnga dang de bzhin mi rnams kyis// nor bu rin po che yis gang bar gyur// byang chub sems dngas dang 'dzin 'di
322a5(mdo sde): thob ste// rtag tu chub par byed cing mi ngoms pa// thul bar dka' zhing mdzod rnams shin tu ma nga // nor yang mang zhing rin chen nor dang ldan// ji ltar cing
322a6(mdo sde): 'dzin rdul bral 'di thob nas// byang chub sems dpa' dga' zhing rangs pa ltar// rgyal srid shin tu 'byor cing rgyas thob kyang // mkhas pa de dag nam yang dgar mi 'gyur// 
322a7(mdo sde): de dang de dag sangs rgyas kun ma khyen gyi// chos rnams rtag tu 'dzin par byed pa yin// zad pa'i mthar thug dus su gyur pa'i tshe// chos kyi mdzod 'chang blo gros chen po 'ang / 
322a8(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyang 'chang ba yin// de dang de dag sems can bye stong dang // khrag khrig chos kyi dbyings kyi mgu bar byed// de dag tshul khrims nong ldan po ma
322b1(mdo sde): can skyes bu de dag bslabs pa'i nor gyis byug/ de dang de dag tshul khrims brtul zhugs gnas// mngon dga' chos kyi sdong po'i mi gu yin// de dag chos gos ngur smrig
322b2(mdo sde): rin chen 'tshong // khom nas 'byung la rtag tu dga' bar byed// de dag sems can pon phyir mnyam pa med// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu zhugs// de dag dul ba sems
322b3(mdo sde): can ma dul 'dul// rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rje su ldan// de dag dul zhing rab tu la rjesu song // zhi ba dbang po rab tu zhi ba yin// de dag sems can nyal ba gnyid leng
322b4(mdo sde): pa/ rtag tu chos kyi skad kyis sad par bye// se mas can dag ni sad par byas nas su// rin chen chos bzang mchog la 'god par byed// de dang de dag sbyin pa'i bdag po
322b5(mdo sde): yin pa 'khor mor rtag tu gtong la brkyang pa ste/ mkhas pa de dag 'jungs dang 'grogs mi byed// gtong pa chen po dag la rtag tu dga'// de dag sems can
322b6(mdo sde): dbul zhing sdug bsngal rnams// mthong nas longs spyod kyis kyang tsham par byed// de dag sems can bde zhing phan pa'i phyir// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtag par zhugs// 
322b7(mdo sde): de dag ye shes rtag tu bslabs pa ste// chos kyi rnga yang rgya cher shin tu rdung // ste ngo kun gyi the tsom 'khri shing bcod// rtag par ye shes la yang rab tu zhugs// de dag legs
322b8(mdo sde): thes chos 'dzin rdul bral ba// 'khor gyi nang du stan la 'dug nas su// mkhas pa blo gros 'chang ba de dag ni// mdo sde bye ba brgya dag rab tu stor// de rang nga dag pang du thos
323a1(mdo sde): pa yin/ thos pa 'dzin pa sangs rgyas chos rnams 'jims ches kyi mdzong rnams shin tu 'dzin byed de// thung ba'i chos kyi gangar la dpa' ba ma
323a2(mdo sde): de dang de dag shes rab yang pa yin// dga' ba dag kyang rgya cher rtag tu sred// zab cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta dka' ba// zhi ba'i ches mchog rnams kyang rab tu sten
323a3(mdo sde): nga dag chos dang chos min shes pa ste/ nges shing blo gros ldan bcos la gnas// chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu ster byed cing // mtshungs med chos kyi mchog la rtag tu sbreng
323a4(mdo sde): dedag chos kyi mchog la lhung byed de// bla ma la yang ri me byed par gnas// chos kyi grong khyeramag la gnas pa ste/ blo gros rgyas pa chos kyi rgya
323a5(mdo sde): mtshan bsgreng // de dag dregs shing rgyags pa'i sems can rnams// rtag tu bag med pa la gnas pa mthong // rab tu ma rung log pa'i lam song zhing // 'khor
323a6(mdo sde): ba'i lam la gnas pa mthong nas ni// de la byams dang snying rje rgya cher bskyed// dga' dang btang snyoms dag la'ang rab gnas te// de dag la ni yan lag brgyad ldan
323a7(mdo sde): / lam mchog zhi ba blta dka' rab tu ston// de dang de dag legs byas chos kyi gru// bshams nas 'khor ba'i rgyun tu ser ba dag/ rgya mtsho chen por lhung
323a8(mdo sde): zhing khyer ba yi// sems can mang po dag ni sgrol bar byed// byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po yis// go bgos dam pa'i chos kyi grur zhugs nas// pha rol
323b1(mdo sde): 'gram bde rtag tu 'jigs med par// khor mor sems can rnams kyang 'god par byed// de dag sman pa'i gtso bo dka' thab la// shin tu spyad pa rig byed sman pa'i
323b2(mdo sde): mchog/ rig pa ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin// dam pa'i chos kyi rdzi yang sprin par byed// nang ri rnam pa mang pos btab pa yi// sems can na ba dag kyang mthong
323b3(mdo sde): nas su// de dag la ni chos kyi bkru sman gtong // chos rnams kyis ni de dag gso bar byed// de dag smra ba pha rol rgol ba 'joms// 'jig rten dbang po tshig
323b4(mdo sde): gi dbang phyug ldan// shes bya kun la dbang byed blo gros 'chang // ye shes da pa'i sa la rab tu gnas// dpa' bo ye shes stobs ldan stobs 'jom pa// ye
323b5(mdo sde): shes ldan pa dag gis yang dag bsngags// sems chan bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/ chos la gnas nas shes pas mgu bar byed// de dang de
323b6(mdo sde): ngag bdag po ded dpon te// gsal ba sems can rnam sa kyi skabs 'dod pa// sems can rin chen lam la rmongs gyur cing // rtag tu bdud kyi snying
323b7(mdo sde): zhugs mthong nas ni// de dag la yang lam mchog zhi zhing bde// rtag par mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ston// mkhas pa dag ni ye shes lam de yis// sems
323b8(mdo sde): can mang po bya brgya 'dren par byed// de dang de dag gnas dang rten du 'gyur// skyabs dang mig dang sgron ma byed pa yin// 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs rab tu sbyar/ 
324a1(mdo sde): skrag pa rnams kyang rtag tu dbugs 'byir byed// de dag sems can shin tu sdug bsngal dang // dmus le 'gyur pa 'di dag rig ras ni// yang dag
324a2(mdo sde): bslabs rin chen chos rnams kyis// res kyi snang ba dag kyang byed par 'gyur// 'jig rter na ni bzor rig ci yod pa// bzo med pas ri sems can pan 'gyur zhing // gang
324a3(mdo sde): gis sems can rtag tu bder 'gyur ba// gzo yi rnam pa de dag shin tu brlabs// su dag byang chub tu mi mnger zhugs te// blo gros ldan 'ang 'jig rjer mig smin pa/ 
324a4(mdo sde): bslabs pa rnams la ma chog gi phyin/ mkhas rab 'jig rten na yang ngo mtshar theb// sangs rgyas dag gi chos mchig thos pa yis// ma tshungs pa med par ngoms par yangs
324a5(mdo sde): paM 'gyur// tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'ja ra pha rol phyir// zab mo yi ni chos rnams shin tu thos// de dag zhi rin chen ches rnams ni// gzhan la sten par
324a6(mdo sde): ngoms par mi 'gyur te// thar pa'i thabs kyi char yang rab 'bebs shing // chos kyi skyes bu dag ni tshim par byed// de yi drung du sems can mang po ni// ches 'dod ma kha
324a7(mdo sde): pa ji snyed ljags na su// chos mchog bzang po dam pa rin po mo// drang zhing gsal ba'i lam rnams mnyan snyam pa// de dag blo gres 'arang bas the tshom bcang // chos kyi de
324a8(mdo sde): dag shin tu mgu bar byed/ tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pha rol phyin// sem can rnams kyi bsam pa rab tu shes// ye shes ldan zhing ye shes mchog rab kyi// pha rol phyin
324b1(mdo sde): pa sems can bsam la mkhas// sems can pha rol sems dang spyod pa dang // gang dag gdam ni ci 'dri chos brjod pa// ye shes gtam ni brjod la gang ngas gis/ sems
324b2(mdo sde): can khrag khrig res mchog rig theb 'gyur// de dag ye shes bye brag pha rol phyir// lam rnabs kyang ni nye bar ston par byed// mkhas pa de dag gi ni sems rnams kyang // bdu
324b3(mdo sde): rnams bye ba steng gis yongs mi shes// ji ltar namakha' la ni bya song ba// de yis rjes ni gang du'ang shes mi nus// ye shes stobs ldan rul zhing rab tu ni// zhi ba 'phags pa
324b4(mdo sde): ye shes dag la gnas// dpa' bo khyu mchog pa dung rnams tham cad bcom// byang chub zhi pa mngon par 'tshang yang rgya// rtag tu rdzu 'phrul dag gis pha rol phyin// nga
324b5(mdo sde): yang brgya phrag mang por 'gro bar bye// sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig mthong // ji bzhin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// de yi mig kyang thogs par mi 'gyur te// byog
324b6(mdo sde): bcu dag gi gzugs mang mthong bar 'gyur// ji snyed phyogs bcu ya ni srid pa na// sems can yod dgu de dag 'dren par gyur// bskal pa bya ba brgya phrag mang por ni// de dag de ye
324b7(mdo sde): pan yem kum brjed cing / spangs pa yis ni rab tu bshad mdzad kyang // sngon gyi spyod pa'i bsngags pa rang mi nus// ting 'dzin mtshungs med rdul dang bral ba 'di // skyes dra su rang 'dzi
324b8(mdo sde): par byed pa ni// sangs rgyas dag gi nang rnams mi zad de// shin tu rgya che ye shes rgya mtsho bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi phung po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste// sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// 
325a1(mdo sde): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhor nung lnga bas na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ren
325a2(mdo sde): ze ngo mtshar dang rmar du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag dang / gzhan yang chad med pa 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
325a3(mdo sde): par 'tshangs rgya bar 'deng pas// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya// gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang par
325a4(mdo sde): rab tu gdod par bya// lung gnad cing 'dzin du du nyon mongs pa med par sgrib pas bsgom par bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya// nges bzeng po'i
325a5(mdo sde): stobs bsgom par bya// bzod pa bsten par bya/ mang du bya/ ches la don tu gcer ba dang / chos 'a dod pa dang chos yongasu 'dzin pa dang // chos dang rjes su 'thur
325a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos la zhugs par bya'o// sangs rgyas mchod pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o// des gnas gsum la brtson par bya ste// gsum gang zhe na/ 'ang lnga ste/ ches mengs pa zang
325a7(mdo sde): pa dang / bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba reg par 'dod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/ 
325a8(mdo sde): khams gsum por dgol 'artson par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur grung pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir// sden thung ba'i gtam bstan pa
325b1(mdo sde): dzang dag tshi gsu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to// bskal pa steng du ji ltar ngas spyad pa// gzhon nur gyur pa nga las mnyan par gyis// ting 'dzin bzang po dam pa
325b2(mdo sde): 'di chol phyir// sangs rgyas dag ni stong phrag brgya yang mchod // de ltar bskal ba 'das pa bsam yasu// zhing brgya yi ni bye ma ci yod pa// dper bstanang snyed 'das par gyur pa
325b3(mdo sde): na// chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal po byung / bye ba stong phrag drug chu mi nyung ba/ rgyal ba de yi tshotshegs ni byung gyur te// thams cad zag pa med cing nyon mongs zad// rnam thar brgyad
325b4(mdo sde): la gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa// de yi dus nas 'di thams cad kyang // bde zhing le legs 'khrug pa med par 'gyur// mi rnams thams cad snyid cing bde dang ldan// mi yi bde ba
325b5(mdo sde): ngag gis rgyas par gyur// thams cad bsod rnams stobs dang ldan pa ste// blta na sdug cing de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad phyug tshong ne ba yang 'byor pa ste// lus
325b6(mdo sde): lha yi bde dang ldan par gyur// nges shing brtul zhugs bzang la nyon mongs chung // bzed pa'i stobs la dpa' zhing byad gzugs bzang // lnga yi gnas na
325b7(mdo sde): lha'i sras po bzhin// tshul khrims yon tan 'chang zhing blo gros ldan// de yi dus na sa bdag byung ba ni// rgyal po me teg ces bya ba yin// de yi bu yang lnga brgyar tshang ba
325b8(mdo sde): byung / dran dang ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan par gyur// rgyal po'i bu de yis kyang rgyal po yi// bskyed mos chal brgya steng phrag drug cu dang // thams cad me tog 'bras bu
326a1(mdo sde): brgyan pa yang // thugs rje ldan pa de la rab tu phul// bskyed mos tshal ni brgya steng sna tshogs dag/ 'chags mal stan bzhugs 'das stong rnams da
326a2(mdo sde): chos gos kyang ni bye ba brgya stong gis// 'chag sa bzhugs gnas rnamasu 'ding ba byas// de ltar rnam pa du ma stong dag dang // dge slong dag gi long sbeng ci snyed pa// rgyal ba'i bu ni
326a3(mdo sde): shin tu yid dang bas// bder gshegs de la thams cad nye bar phul// rgyal po de yang dge ba'i las bcu yi// lam la rab tu gnas par gyur nasu// skye bo sreg chags khrag
326a4(mdo sde): khrig bcu stong gis// mdun du bad te 'dren pa lta bar song / me tho dag dang byug pa bdun pa dang // bdugs dang rgyal mtsham mam snyan khrims su/ rgyal ba de la wa~M
326a5(mdo sde): mcher byas te// thal me sbyar nas spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha min gnod sbyin dang // dge slong ste nga yang de tshe dga' bar gyur// rgyal ba mched pa
326a6(mdo sde): 'di ni lung ston tam// mi yi dbang po legs par chos gsung ngam// rgyal po'i bu de yi ni bsam pa dang // bla med sems kyang rang byung mkhyen nas ni// mes pa'i gnas la
326a7(mdo sde): pha rol phyin pa yis// de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad// gang tshe bde bar gshegs pas gsung phyung ba// de tshe nags khrid bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos// mamakha' las ni
326a8(mdo sde): me tog char kyang 'ang// sa las pad+ma brgya dag zung bar gyur// ston pa don gyi tshig la rab bslabs pas// bsam pa ma byin nas 'dren pas lung bstan te// maM yi dpa
326b1(mdo sde): ji bzhin gleg dang sprin 'dra ste// stong g.yo bdag dang sems can srog kun med// bzod ma nas ni stong zhing ma 'ongs chos// song ba med cing gnas med gnas kyis dben/ 
326b2(mdo sde): sgyu ma'i rang bzhin drug tu snying po med// thams cad dag cing rnam dag na mkha' bzhin// mi snga mi ser dkar po ma yin te// mang ni gseg gyur sgra yi rang bzhin yin// sems na
326b3(mdo sde): dben zhing sems med rang bzhin te// skad cig yin pas thams cang sgra dang bral// bshad pa na yang yi ge 'pho ba med// ma bshad na yang yi ge 'drer mi 'gyur/ 
326b4(mdo sde): yi ge dag ni phyog su'ang mi 'gro ste// yi ge gang nas kyang ni 'ongs ma yin// yi ge mi zad rnying 'gags pa ste// bshad par byas sam bshad par ma byas
326b5(mdo sde): sam bshad par ma byas kyang // yi ge 'di dag rtag par mi zad brjod// gang gis yongs shes de'ang zad mi 'gyur// chos ni stong phrag brgya dag rab brjod nas// sangs rgyas brgya
326b6(mdo sde): stong dang 'i gang 'das pa// chos kyang ma zang yi ge zangs grug/ skye ba'ang med dpyir mi zad pa// gang gis mi zad ces rnams rab shes pa// rtab tu mi zad pa yi chas
326b7(mdo sde): pas// mdo sde brgya snyeng dag ni bshad byas kyang // chos rnams thams cad yi ge med par shes// rgyal ba'i chos ni gang dag rab ston pa// dri yang mi zad pas na ma
327a1(mdo sde): mthang ste// chos 'di snga nas bdag med sems can med// de dag rab tu ston kyang zad mi 'gyur// mkhas pa de ni tshig kun smra byed kyang // tshig gi sa

327b1(mdo sde): pa tsam du brtags nas brjod pa yin// 'khor ba na ni mtha' ma ma rnyed de// gang dag sngon byung mtha' ni mtshan nyid med// ma 'ongs dus kyang shes rab bya ba'i phyir// las dang bya ba

327b7(mdo sde): pa mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/ rgyal po des ni ci tsam chos rig pa// de tsam du sa rgyal ba des bshad// rgyal pos rgyal ba'i chos 'di thos nas ni// 'khor dang bcas ba
327b8(mdo sde): pa yang dag bzung // rgyal po'i bu ngas ting 'dzina'i mnyan nas// dga' zhing yid rangs tshig kyang 'di skad smra// shin tu legs par ting 'dzin 'di bshad// khyod kyi zhabs la
329a1(mdo sde): bdag ni phyag 'tshal// der yang sreg chags stong phrag brgyad cu yang // yang dag don dang nges par bstan pa 'di// chos kyi rang bzhin bzang po 'di

329a6(mdo sde): yang brgya phrag nyi shur chos rnams spyad// de nas dus kyang gzhan du byung ba'i tshe// rgyal ba de yang yongasu mya ngan 'das// rgyal ba'o nyan thos rnams kyang 'das

329a8(mdo sde): zhi ba 'ang yang bshad/ de ni 'jam zhing mnyan par gyur pa ste// srog chags brgya stong dag gis bkur stir byas// lha yang bye ba brgya dag phyir 'brang zhing // grong du 'ongs nas bsngar
